word.latinvulgate: et timebunt qui habitant terminos a signis tuis ; exitus matutini et vespere delectabis.
word.italian1927: e tutti gli uomini temeranno, e racconteranno l’opera di Dio, e considereranno quello ch’egli avrà fatto.
word.german1912: Und alle Menschen werden sich fürchten und sagen: "Das hat Gott getan!" und merken, daß es sein Werk sei.
word.french1910: Tous les hommes sont saisis de crainte, Ils publient ce que Dieu fait, Et prennent garde à son oeuvre.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 眾人都要懼怕，要傳揚　神的作為，並且要思想他所作的事。
word.korean: 모든 사람이 두려워하여 하나님의 일을 선포하며 그 행하심을 깊이 생각하리로다
word.tagalog: At lahat ng mga tao ay mangatatakot; at kanilang ipahahayag ang salita ng Dios, at may karunungang kanilang bubuhayin ang kanilang gawa.
word.maori: Ka wehi ano hoki nga tangata katoa, ka whakapuaki i te mahi a te Atua: ka ata maharatia hoki e ratou tana mahi.
word.cebuano: Ug ang tanang mga tawo mangahadlok; Ug sila magamantala sa buhat sa Dios, Ug sa pagkamanggialamon magapalandong sila sa iyang buhat.
word.hebrew: ט  ויכשילוהו עלימו לשונם    יתנדדו כל-ראה בם
word.hebrewmodern: וייראו כל אדם ויגידו פעל אלהים ומעשהו השכילו׃
word.greekot: καὶ φοβηθήσονται οἱ κατοικοῦντες τὰ πέρατα ἀπὸ τῶν σημείων σου ἐξόδους πρωίας καὶ ἑσπέρας τέρψεις

word.kjv: Understand, ye brutish among the people: and ye fools, when will ye be wise?
word.thailand: คนเขลาที่สุดของประชาชนเอ๋ย จงเข้าใจเถิด คนโง่ทั้งหลาย เมื่อไรเจ้าจึงจะฉลาด
word.spanish1909: Entended, necios del pueblo; Y vosotros fatuos, ¿cuándo seréis sabios?
word.latinvulgate: Hodie si vocem ejus audieritis, nolite obdurare corda vestra
word.italian1927: Abbiate intendimento, voi gli stolti fra il popolo! E voi, pazzi, quando sarete savi?
word.german1912: Merket doch, ihr Narren unter dem Volk! Und ihr Toren, wann wollt ihr klug werden?
word.french1910: Prenez-y garde, hommes stupides! Insensés, quand serez-vous sages?
word.chinesencvtraditional: 民間的愚昧人哪！你們要留心；愚頑人哪！你們要到幾時才能明白呢？
word.korean: 백성 중 우준한 자들아 너희는 생각하라 무지한 자들아 너희가 언제나 지혜로울꼬
word.tagalog: Gunitain ninyo, ninyong mga hangal sa gitna ng bayan: at ninyong mga mangmang, kailan tayo magiging pantas?
word.maori: Kia matau, e nga poauau o te iwi: a hea ano koutou whai mahara ai, e nga kuware?
word.cebuano: Palandunga ninyo, kamong mga mananapon sa taliwala sa katawohan; Ug kamong mga buang, anus-a pa ba kamo magmanggialamon?
word.hebrew: ח  בינו בערים בעם    וכסילים מתי תשכילו
word.hebrewmodern: בינו בערים בעם וכסילים מתי תשכילו׃
word.greekot: μὴ σκληρύνητε τὰς καρδίας ὑμῶν ὡς ἐν τῷ παραπικρασμῷ κατὰ τὴν ἡμέραν τοῦ πειρασμοῦ ἐν τῇ ἐρήμῳ

word.kjv: I will behave myself wisely in a perfect way. O when wilt thou come unto me? I will walk within my house with a perfect heart.
word.thailand: ข้าพระองค์จะประพฤติอย่างเฉลียวฉลาดตามมรรคาที่ดีรอบคอบ เมื่อไรพระองค์จะเสด็จมาหาข้าพระองค์ ข้าพระองค์จะดำเนินด้วยใจซื่อสัตย์ภายในเรือนของข้าพระองค์
word.spanish1909: Entenderé en el camino de la perfección Cuando vinieres á mí: En integridad de mi corazón andaré en medio de mi casa.
word.latinvulgate: Domine, exaudi orationem meam, et clamor meus ad te veniat.
word.italian1927: Io m’applicherò a seguire la via perfetta; quando verrai a me?… Io camminerò con integrità di cuore, in seno alla mia casa.
word.german1912: Ich handle vorsichtig und redlich bei denen, die mir zugehören, und wandle treulich in meinem Hause.
word.french1910: Je prendrai garde à la voie droite. Quand viendras-tu à moi? Je marcherai dans l'intégrité de mon coeur, Au milieu de ma maison.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我要小心謹慎行正直的路；你甚麼時候才到我這裡來呢？我要在我的家中，以正直的心行事。
word.korean: 내가 완전한 길에 주의하오리니 주께서 언제나 내게 임하시겠나이까 내가 완전한 마음으로 내 집안에서 행하리이다
word.tagalog: Ako'y magpapakapantas sa sakdal na lakad: Oh kailan ka pasasa akin? Ako'y lalakad sa loob ng aking bahay na may sakdal na puso.
word.maori: Ka ata whakahaere ahau i ahau i runga i te ara tika. A hea koe haere mai ai ki ahau? Ka haereere ahau i roto i toku whare i runga i te ngakau tapatahi.
word.cebuano: Sa pagkamanggialamon magagawi ako sa akong kaugalingon sa dalan nga hingpit: Oh kanus-a ikaw moanhi kanako? Sa hingpit nga kasingkasing magalakaw ako sa sulod sa akong balay.
word.hebrew: ב  אשכילה בדרך תמים--    מתי תבוא אלי אתהלך בתם-לבבי    בקרב ביתי
word.hebrewmodern: אשכילה בדרך תמים מתי תבוא אלי אתהלך בתם לבבי בקרב ביתי׃
word.greekot: εἰσάκουσον κύριε τῆς προσευχῆς μου καὶ ἡ κραυγή μου πρὸς σὲ ἐλθάτω

word.kjv: Whoso is wise, and will observe these things, even they shall understand the lovingkindness of the LORD.
word.thailand: ผู้ใดฉลาดและจะรักษาสิ่งเหล่านี้ ก็จะเข้าใจถึงความเมตตาของพระเยโฮวาห์
word.spanish1909: ¿Quién es sabio y guardará estas cosas, Y entenderá las misericordias de Jehová?
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: Chi è savio osservi queste cose, e consideri la benignità dell’Eterno.
word.german1912: Wer ist weise und behält dies? So werden sie merken, wie viel Wohltaten der HERR erzeigt.
word.french1910: Que celui qui est sage prenne garde à ces choses, Et qu'il soit attentif aux bontés de l'Eternel.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 凡有智慧的，願他留意這些事；願他思想耶和華的慈愛。
word.korean: 지혜 있는 자들은 이 일에 주의하고 여호와의 인자하심을 깨달으리로다
word.tagalog: Kung sino ang pantas ay magbulay sa mga bagay na ito, at kanilang magugunita ang mga kagandahang-loob ng Panginoon.
word.maori: Ko te tangata whakaaro nui ka mahara ki enei mea, a ka mohio ratou ki te aroha o Ihowa.
word.cebuano: Bisan kinsa nga manggialamon manumbaling niining mga butanga; Ug sila magapalandong sa mahigugmaong-kalolot ni Jehova.
word.hebrew: מג  מי-חכם וישמר-אלה    ויתבוננו חסדי יהוה
word.hebrewmodern: מי חכם וישמר אלה ויתבוננו חסדי יהוה׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: Thou through thy commandments hast made me wiser than mine enemies: for they are ever with me.
word.thailand: โดยพระบัญญัติของพระองค์ พระองค์ทรงกระทำให้ข้าพระองค์ฉลาดกว่าศัตรูของข้าพระองค์ เพราะพระบัญญัตินั้นอยู่กับข้าพระองค์เสมอ
word.spanish1909: Me has hecho más sabio que mis enemigos con tus mandamientos; Porque me son eternos.
word.latinvulgate: no translation for this version
word.italian1927: I tuoi comandamenti mi rendon più savio dei miei nemici; perché sono sempre meco.
word.german1912: Du machst mich mit deinem Gebot weiser, als meine Feinde sind; denn es ist ewiglich mein Schatz.
word.french1910: Tes commandements me rendent plus sage que mes ennemis, Car je les ai toujours avec moi.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 你的命令使我比我的仇敵更有智慧，因為你的命令常存在我裡面。
word.korean: 교만하여 저주를 받으며 주의 계명에서 떠나는 자를 주께서 꾸짖으셨나이다
word.tagalog: Pinarunong ako kay sa aking mga kaaway ng iyong mga utos; sapagka't mga laging sumasa akin.
word.maori: ¶ Nau i hira ake ai oku whakaaro i o oku hoariri, na au whakahau, e piri tonu nei ki ahau.
word.cebuano: Ang imong mga sugo nakapahimo kanako nga labi pang manggialamon kay sa akong mga kaaway; Kay sila ania kanako sa kanunay.
word.hebrew: צח  מאיבי תחכמני מצותך    כי לעולם היא-לי
word.hebrewmodern: מאיבי תחכמני מצותך כי לעולם היא לי׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: A wise man will hear, and will increase learning; and a man of understanding shall attain unto wise counsels:
word.thailand: ทั้งปราชญ์จะได้ยินและเพิ่มพูนการเรียนรู้ และคนที่มีความเข้าใจจะได้คำปรึกษาที่ฉลาด
word.spanish1909: Oirá el sabio, y aumentará el saber; Y el entendido adquirirá consejo;
word.latinvulgate: Audiens sapiens, sapientior erit, et intelligens gubernacula possidebit.
word.italian1927: Il savio ascolterà, e accrescerà il suo sapere; l’uomo intelligente ne ritrarrà buone direzioni
word.german1912: Wer weise ist der hört zu und bessert sich; wer verständig ist, der läßt sich raten,
word.french1910: Que le sage écoute, et il augmentera son savoir, Et celui qui est intelligent acquerra de l'habileté,
word.chinesencvtraditional: 使智慧人聽了，可以增長學問，使聰明人聽了，可以獲得智謀；
word.korean: 지혜있는 자는 듣고 학식이 더할 것이요 명철한 자는 모략을 얻을 것이라
word.tagalog: Upang marinig ng pantas, at lumago sa ikatututo: at upang tamuhin ng taong may unawa ang magagaling na payo:
word.maori: Kia whakarongo ai te tangata whakaaro nui, kia nui ake ai tona mohio; kia whiwhi ai te tangata tupato ki nga whakaaro mohio:
word.cebuano: Aron ang tawo nga manggialamon makadungog, ug magadugang sa kinaadman; Ug aron ang tawo nga masinabuton makabaton sa maayong mga tambag:
word.hebrew: ה  ישמע חכם ויוסף לקח    ונבון תחבלות יקנה
word.hebrewmodern: ישמע חכם ויוסף לקח ונבון תחבלות יקנה׃
word.greekot: τῶνδε γὰρ ἀκούσας σοφὸς σοφώτερος ἔσται ὁ δὲ νοήμων κυβέρνησιν κτήσεται

word.kjv: To understand a proverb, and the interpretation; the words of the wise, and their dark sayings.
word.thailand: เพื่อให้เข้าใจสุภาษิตและปริศนา ทั้งถ้อยคำของปราชญ์และปริศนาที่ลึกลับของเขา
word.spanish1909: Para entender parábola y declaración; Palabras de sabios, y sus dichos oscuros.
word.latinvulgate: Animadvertet parabolam et interpretationem, verba sapientum et ænigmata eorum.
word.italian1927: per capire i proverbi e le allegorie, le parole dei savi e i loro enigmi.
word.german1912: daß er verstehe die Sprüche und ihre Deutung, die Lehre der Weisen und ihre Beispiele.
word.french1910: Pour saisir le sens d'un proverbe ou d'une énigme, Des paroles des sages et de leurs sentences.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 使人明白箴言和譬喻，懂得智慧人的言詞和他們的隱語。
word.korean: 잠언과 비유와 지혜있는 자의 말과 그 오묘한 말을 깨달으리라
word.tagalog: Upang umunawa ng kawikaan at ng kahulugan; ng mga salita ng pantas, at ng kanilang malalabong sabi.
word.maori: E mohio ai ia ki te whakatauki, ki te kupu whakarite, ki nga kupu a nga whakaaro nui, ki a ratou korero whakapeka.
word.cebuano: Sa pagsabut sa usa ka proverbio, ug sa usa ka pulong salabton, Mga pulong sa manggialamon, ug sa ilang mga tigmo.
word.hebrew: ו  להבין משל ומליצה    דברי חכמים וחידתם
word.hebrewmodern: להבין משל ומליצה דברי חכמים וחידתם׃
word.greekot: νοήσει τε παραβολὴν καὶ σκοτεινὸν λόγον ῥήσεις τε σοφῶν καὶ αἰνίγματα

word.kjv: Be not wise in thine own eyes: fear the LORD, and depart from evil.
word.thailand: อย่าทำตัวฉลาดตามสายตาของตนเอง จงยำเกรงพระเยโฮวาห์ และออกไปเสียจากความชั่วร้าย
word.spanish1909: No seas sabio en tu opinión: Teme á Jehová, y apártate del mal;
word.latinvulgate: Ne sis sapiens apud temetipsum ; time Deum, et recede a malo :
word.italian1927: Non ti stimar savio da te stesso; temi l’Eterno e ritirati dal male;
word.german1912: Dünke dich nicht, weise zu sein, sondern fürchte den HERRN und weiche vom Bösen.
word.french1910: Ne sois point sage à tes propres yeux, Crains l'Eternel, et détourne-toi du mal:
word.chinesencvtraditional: 不可自以為有智慧，要敬畏耶和華，遠離惡事。
word.korean: 스스로 지혜롭게 여기지 말지어다 여호와를 경외하며 악을 떠날지어다
word.tagalog: Huwag kang magpakapantas sa iyong sariling mga mata; matakot ka sa Panginoon, at humiwalay ka sa kasamaan:
word.maori: ¶ Kei whakaaro ki a koe he mohio koe; e wehi ki a Ihowa, kia mawehe i te kino.
word.cebuano: Ayaw pagpakamaalamon sa imong kaugalingong mga mata; Kahadlokan mo si Jehova, ug pahalayo gikan sa dautan:
word.hebrew: ז  אל-תהי חכם בעיניך    ירא את-יהוה וסור מרע
word.hebrewmodern: אל תהי חכם בעיניך ירא את יהוה וסור מרע׃
word.greekot: μὴ ἴσθι φρόνιμος παρὰ σεαυτῷ φοβοῦ δὲ τὸν θεὸν καὶ ἔκκλινε ἀπὸ παντὸς κακοῦ

word.kjv: The wise shall inherit glory: but shame shall be the promotion of fools.
word.thailand: คนฉลาดจะได้เกียรติเป็นมรดก แต่คนโง่จะได้ความอัปยศเป็นตำแหน่ง
word.spanish1909: Los sabios heredarán honra: Mas los necios sostendrán ignominia.
word.latinvulgate: Gloriam sapientes possidebunt ; stultorum exaltatio ignominia.
word.italian1927: I savi erederanno la gloria, ma l’ignominia è la parte degli stolti.
word.german1912: Die Weisen werden Ehre erben; aber wenn die Narren hochkommen, werden sie doch zu Schanden.
word.french1910: Les sages hériteront la gloire, Mais les insensés ont la honte en partage.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 智慧人必承受尊榮，愚昧人必蒙受羞辱（“必蒙受羞辱”原文作“高升成為羞辱”）。
word.korean: 지혜로운 자는 영광을 기업으로 받거니와 미련한 자의 현달함은 욕이 되느니라
word.tagalog: Ang pantas ay magmamana ng kaluwalhatian; nguni't kahihiyan ay magiging ganti sa mga mangmang.
word.maori: Ka whiwhi te hunga whakaaro nui ki te kororia; he whakama ia te whakanui o nga wairangi.
word.cebuano: Ang manggialamon makapanunod sa himaya; Apan ang kaulaw maoy makapauswag sa mga buang.
word.hebrew: לה  כבוד חכמים ינחלו    וכסילים מרים קלון
word.hebrewmodern: כבוד חכמים ינחלו וכסילים מרים קלון׃
word.greekot: δόξαν σοφοὶ κληρονομήσουσιν οἱ δὲ ἀσεβεῖς ὕψωσαν ἀτιμίαν

word.kjv: Go to the ant, thou sluggard; consider her ways, and be wise:
word.thailand: คนเกียจคร้านเอ๋ย ไปหามดไป๊ พิเคราะห์ดูทางของมัน และจงฉลาด
word.spanish1909: Ve á la hormiga, oh perezoso Mira sus caminos, y sé sabio;
word.latinvulgate: Vade ad formicam, o piger, et considera vias ejus, et disce sapientiam.
word.italian1927: Va’, pigro, alla formica; considera il suo fare, e diventa savio!
word.german1912: Gehe hin zur Ameise, du Fauler; siehe ihre Weise an und lerne!
word.french1910: Va vers la fourmi, paresseux; Considère ses voies, et deviens sage.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 不可懶惰懶惰人哪！你去看看螞蟻，察看牠們所行的，就可得著智慧。
word.korean: 게으른 자여 개미에게로 가서 그 하는 것을 보고 지혜를 얻으라
word.tagalog: Pumaroon ka sa langgam, ikaw na tamad; masdan mo ang kaniyang mga lakad at magpakapantas ka:
word.maori: ¶ Haere ki te popokorua, e te tangata mangere, matakitakina iho ona ara, kia nui ai ou whakaaro:
word.cebuano: Umadto ka sa olmigas, ikaw nga tapulan; Palandunga ang iyang mga dalan, ug pagmaalamon:
word.hebrew: ו  לך-אל-נמלה עצל    ראה דרכיה וחכם
word.hebrewmodern: לך אל נמלה עצל ראה דרכיה וחכם׃
word.greekot: ἴθι πρὸς τὸν μύρμηκα ὦ ὀκνηρέ καὶ ζήλωσον ἰδὼν τὰς ὁδοὺς αὐτοῦ καὶ γενοῦ ἐκείνου σοφώτερος

word.kjv: Hear instruction, and be wise, and refuse it not.
word.thailand: จงฟังคำสั่งสอน และจงฉลาด และอย่าเพิกเฉยเสีย
word.spanish1909: Atended el consejo, y sed sabios, Y no lo menospreciéis.
word.latinvulgate: Audite disciplinam, et estote sapientes, et nolite abjicere eam.
word.italian1927: Ascoltate l’istruzione, siate savi, e non la rigettate!
word.german1912: Höret die Zucht und werdet weise und lasset sie nicht fahren.
word.french1910: Ecoutez l'instruction, pour devenir sages, Ne la rejetez pas.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 你們要聽從教訓，要作智慧人，不可離棄教訓。
word.korean: 아들들아 이제 내게 들으라 내 도를 지키는 자가 복이 있느니라
word.tagalog: Mangakinig kayo ng turo, at kayo'y magpakapantas, at huwag ninyong tanggihan.
word.maori: Whakarongo mai ki te ako, kia whai whakaaro ai koutou; kaua hoki e paopaongia.
word.cebuano: Pamatia ang pahamatngon, ug pagmanggialamon, Ug ayaw kini pag-isalikway.
word.hebrew: לג  שמעו מוסר וחכמו    ואל-תפרעו
word.hebrewmodern: שמעו מוסר וחכמו ואל תפרעו׃
word.greekot: μακάριος ἀνήρ ὃς εἰσακούσεταί μου καὶ ἄνθρωπος ὃς τὰς ἐμὰς ὁδοὺς φυλάξει ἀγρυπνῶν ἐπ' ἐμαῖς θύραις καθ' ἡμέραν τηρῶν σταθμοὺς ἐμῶν εἰσόδων

word.kjv: Reprove not a scorner, lest he hate thee: rebuke a wise man, and he will love thee.
word.thailand: อย่าตักเตือนคนมักเยาะเย้ย เพราะเขาจะเกลียดเจ้า จงตักเตือนปราชญ์ และเขาจะรักเจ้า
word.spanish1909: No reprendas al escarnecedor, porque no te aborrezca: Corrige al sabio, y te amará.
word.latinvulgate: Noli arguere derisorem, ne oderit te ; argue sapientem, et diliget te.
word.italian1927: Non riprendere il beffardo, per tema che t’odi; riprendi il savio, e t’amerà.
word.german1912: Strafe den Spötter nicht, er haßt dich; strafe den Weisen, der wird dich lieben.
word.french1910: Ne reprends pas le moqueur, de crainte qu'il ne te haïsse; Reprends le sage, et il t'aimera.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 你不要責備好譏笑人的，免得他恨你；要責備智慧人，他必愛你。
word.korean: 거만한 자를 책망하지 말라 그가 너를 미워할까 두려우니라 지혜있는 자를 책망하라 그가 너를 사랑하리라
word.tagalog: Huwag mong sawayin ang manglilibak, baka ipagtanim ka niya: sawayin mo ang pantas, at kaniyang iibigin ka.
word.maori: Kaua e riria te tangata whakahi, kei kino ia ki a koe: riria ko te tangata whakaaro nui, a ka aroha ia ki a koe.
word.cebuano: Ayaw pagbadlonga ang usa ka mayubiton, tingali unya siya magadumot kanimo: Badlonga ang usa ka tawong manggialamon, ug siya mahagugma kanimo.
word.hebrew: ח  אל-תוכח לץ פן-ישנאך    הוכח לחכם ויאהבך
word.hebrewmodern: אל תוכח לץ פן ישנאך הוכח לחכם ויאהבך׃
word.greekot: μὴ ἔλεγχε κακούς ἵνα μὴ μισῶσίν σε ἔλεγχε σοφόν καὶ ἀγαπήσει σε

word.kjv: Give instruction to a wise man, and he will be yet wiser: teach a just man, and he will increase in learning.
word.thailand: จงให้คำสั่งสอนแก่ปราชญ์และเขาจะฉลาดยิ่งขึ้น จงสอนคนชอบธรรมและเขาจะเพิ่มการเรียนรู้มากขึ้น
word.spanish1909: Da al sabio, y será más sabio: Enseña al justo, y acrecerá su saber.
word.latinvulgate: Da sapienti occasionem, et addetur ei sapientia ; doce justum, et festinabit accipere.
word.italian1927: Istruisci il savio e diventerai più savio che mai; ammaestra il giusto e accrescerà il suo sapere.
word.german1912: Gib dem Weisen, so wird er noch weiser werden; lehre den Gerechten, so wird er in der Lehre zunehmen.
word.french1910: Donne au sage, et il deviendra plus sage; Instruis le juste, et il augmentera son savoir.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 教導智慧人，他就越有智慧；指教義人，他就增加學問。
word.korean: 지혜 있는 자에게 교훈을 더하라 그가 더욱 지혜로와질 것이요 의로운 사람을 가르치라 그의 학식이 더하리라
word.tagalog: Turuan mo ang pantas, at siya'y magiging lalong pantas pa: iyong turuan ang matuwid, at siya'y lalago sa pagkatuto.
word.maori: Hoatu te mohio ki te tangata whakaaro nui, a ka neke ake ona whakaaro; whakaakona te tangata tika, a ka nui ake tona mohio.
word.cebuano: Hatagi ug pahamatngon ang usa ka tawong manggialamon, ug siya magamaalamon pa sa pagsamot: Tudloi ang matarung nga tawo, ug siya magadugang pa sa kinaadman.
word.hebrew: ט  תן לחכם ויחכם-עוד    הודע לצדיק ויוסף לקח
word.hebrewmodern: תן לחכם ויחכם עוד הודע לצדיק ויוסף לקח׃
word.greekot: δίδου σοφῷ ἀφορμήν καὶ σοφώτερος ἔσται γνώριζε δικαίῳ καὶ προσθήσει τοῦ δέχεσθαι

word.kjv: If thou be wise, thou shalt be wise for thyself: but if thou scornest, thou alone shalt bear it.
word.thailand: ถ้าเจ้าฉลาด เจ้าก็ฉลาดเพื่อตนเอง ถ้าเจ้าเยาะเย้ย เจ้าก็จะทนแต่ลำพัง
word.spanish1909: Si fueres sabio, para ti lo serás: Mas si fueres escarnecedor, pagarás tú solo.
word.latinvulgate: Si sapiens fueris, tibimetipsi eris ; si autem illusor, solus portabis malum.
word.italian1927: Se sei savio, sei savio per te stesso; se sei beffardo, tu solo ne porterai la pena.
word.german1912: Bist du weise, so bist du dir weise; bist du ein Spötter, so wirst du es allein tragen.
word.french1910: Si tu es sage, tu es sage pour toi; Si tu es moqueur, tu en porteras seul la peine.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 如果你有智慧，你的智慧必使你得益；如果你譏笑人，你就必獨自擔當一切後果。
word.korean: 네가 만일 지혜로우면 그 지혜가 네게 유익할 것이나 네가 만일 거만하면 너 홀로 해를 당하리라
word.tagalog: Kung ikaw ay pantas, ikaw ay pantas sa ganang iyong sarili: at kung ikaw ay manglilibak, ikaw na magisa ang magpapasan.
word.maori: Ki te nui ou whakaaro, mou ano ou whakaaro nui; ki te whakahi koe, mau anake tau pikaunga.
word.cebuano: Kong ikaw manggialamon, ikaw manggialamon sa imong kaugalingon; Ug kong ikaw magayubit, ikaw ra ang magadala niini.
word.hebrew: יב  אם-חכמת חכמת לך    ולצת לבדך תשא
word.hebrewmodern: אם חכמת חכמת לך ולצת לבדך תשא׃
word.greekot: διαπορεύεται δὲ δι' ἀνύδρου ἐρήμου καὶ γῆν διατεταγμένην ἐν διψώδεσιν συνάγει δὲ χερσὶν ἀκαρπίαν

word.kjv: The proverbs of Solomon. A wise son maketh a glad father: but a foolish son is the heaviness of his mother.
word.thailand: สุภาษิตของซาโลมอน บุตรชายที่ฉลาดกระทำให้บิดายินดี แต่บุตรชายที่โง่เป็นความโศกของมารดาเขา
word.spanish1909: Las sentencias de Salomón. EL hijo sabio alegra al padre; Y el hijo necio es tristeza de su madre.
word.latinvulgate: Filius sapiens lætificat patrem, filius vero stultus mœstitia est matris suæ.
word.italian1927: Proverbi di Salomone. Un figliuol savio rallegra suo padre, ma un figliuolo stolto è il cordoglio di sua madre.
word.german1912: Dies sind die Sprüche Salomos. Ein weiser Sohn ist seines Vaters Freude; aber ein törichter Sohn ist seiner Mutter Grämen.
word.french1910: Proverbes de Salomon. Un fils sage fait la joie d'un père, Et un fils insensé le chagrin de sa mère.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 敬畏　神使人日子增多所羅門的箴言：智慧的兒子使父親歡樂，愚昧的兒子使母親憂愁。
word.korean: 솔로몬의 잠언이라 지혜로운 아들은 아비로 기쁘게 하거니와 미련한 아들은 어미의 근심이니라
word.tagalog: Mga kawikaan ni Salomon. Ang pantas na anak ay nakapagpapasaya sa ama: nguni't ang mangmang na anak ay pasan ng kaniyang ina.
word.maori: ¶ Ko nga whakatauki a Horomona. He tama whakaaro nui, ka koa te papa: tena he tama kuware, he utanga nui mo tona whaea.
word.cebuano: Ang mga proverbio ni Salomon. Ang usa ka anak nga manggialamon maoy kalipay sa iyang amahan; Apan ang usa ka anak nga buang-buang maoy kaguol sa iyang inahan.
word.hebrew: א                  משלי שלמה בן חכם ישמח-אב    ובן כסיל תוגת אמו
word.hebrewmodern: משלי שלמה בן חכם ישמח אב ובן כסיל תוגת אמו׃
word.greekot: υἱὸς σοφὸς εὐφραίνει πατέρα υἱὸς δὲ ἄφρων λύπη τῇ μητρί

word.kjv: He that gathereth in summer is a wise son: but he that sleepeth in harvest is a son that causeth shame.
word.thailand: ผู้ที่ส่ำสมไว้ในฤดูแล้งก็เป็นบุตรชายที่ฉลาด แต่ผู้หลับในฤดูเกี่ยวก็เป็นบุตรชายที่นำความอับอายมา
word.spanish1909: El que recoge en el estío es hombre entendido: El que duerme en el tiempo de la siega es hombre afrentoso.
word.latinvulgate: Qui congregat in messe, filius sapiens est ; qui autem stertit æstate, filius confusionis.
word.italian1927: Chi raccoglie nella estate è un figliuolo prudente, ma chi dorme durante la raccolta è un figliuolo che fa vergogna.
word.german1912: Wer im Sommer sammelt, der ist klug; wer aber in der Ernte schläft, wird zu Schanden.
word.french1910: Celui qui amasse pendant l'été est un fils prudent, Celui qui dort pendant la moisson est un fils qui fait honte.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 夏天收聚的，是明慧的人，收割時沉睡的，是貽羞的人。
word.korean: 여름에 거두는 자는 지혜로운 아들이나 추수 때에 자는 자는 부끄러움을 끼치는 아들이니라
word.tagalog: Siyang nagtitipon sa taginit ay pantas na anak: nguni't siyang natutulog sa pagaani ay anak na kahiyahiya.
word.maori: ¶ He kohi raumati ta tama ngakau mahara: he whakama ia te rawa a tama moe ngahuru.
word.cebuano: Kadtong nagaani panahon sa tinginit maoy usa ka manggialamon nga anak; Apan kadtong nagakatulog sa tingani maoy usa ka anak nga nagapakaulaw.
word.hebrew: ה  אגר בקיץ בן משכיל    נרדם בקציר בן מביש
word.hebrewmodern: אגר בקיץ בן משכיל נרדם בקציר בן מביש׃
word.greekot: διεσώθη ἀπὸ καύματος υἱὸς νοήμων ἀνεμόφθορος δὲ γίνεται ἐν ἀμήτῳ υἱὸς παράνομος

word.kjv: The wise in heart will receive commandments: but a prating fool shall fall.
word.thailand: ผู้ที่มีใจประกอบด้วยปัญญาจะยอมรับบัญญัติ แต่คนที่พูดโง่ๆจะล้มลง
word.spanish1909: El sabio de corazón recibirá los mandamientos: Mas el loco de labios caerá.
word.latinvulgate: Sapiens corde præcepta suscipit ; stultus cæditur labiis.
word.italian1927: Il savio di cuore accetta i precetti, ma lo stolto di labbra va in precipizio.
word.german1912: Wer weise von Herzen ist nimmt die Gebote an; wer aber ein Narrenmaul hat, wird geschlagen.
word.french1910: Celui qui est sage de coeur reçoit les préceptes, Mais celui qui est insensé des lèvres court à sa perte.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 心存智慧的，必接受誡命；嘴唇愚妄的，必自招滅亡。
word.korean: 마음이 지혜로운 자는 명령을 받거니와 입이 미련한 자는 패망하리라
word.tagalog: Ang pantas sa puso ay tatanggap ng mga utos: nguni't ang madaldal na musmos ay mabubuwal.
word.maori: ¶ He ngakau whakaaro, ka tahuritia te whakahau: he ngutu wairangi, ka hinga.
word.cebuano: Ang manggialamon sa kasingkasing magadawat ug mga sugo; Apan ang usa ka buang-buang nga witwitan mahulog sa kagul-anan .
word.hebrew: ח  חכם-לב יקח מצות    ואויל שפתים ילבט
word.hebrewmodern: חכם לב יקח מצות ואויל שפתים ילבט׃
word.greekot: σοφὸς καρδίᾳ δέξεται ἐντολάς ὁ δὲ ἄστεγος χείλεσιν σκολιάζων ὑποσκελισθήσεται

word.kjv: In the multitude of words there wanteth not sin: but he that refraineth his lips is wise.
word.thailand: การพูดมากก็จะไม่ขาดความผิดบาป แต่เขาผู้ยับยั้งริมฝีปากของตนเป็นผู้ที่ฉลาด
word.spanish1909: En las muchas palabras no falta pecado: Mas el que refrena sus labios es prudente.
word.latinvulgate: In multiloquio non deerit peccatum, qui autem moderatur labia sua prudentissimus est.
word.italian1927: Nella moltitudine delle parole non manca la colpa, ma chi frena le sue labbra è prudente.
word.german1912: Wo viel Worte sind, da geht's ohne Sünde nicht ab; wer aber seine Lippen hält, ist klug.
word.french1910: Celui qui parle beaucoup ne manque pas de pécher, Mais celui qui retient ses lèvres est un homme prudent.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 多言多語難免有過失；約束自己嘴唇的，是明慧人。
word.korean: 의인의 입술은 여러 사람을 교육하나 미련한 자는 지식이 없으므로 죽느니라
word.tagalog: Sa karamihan ng mga salita ay hindi nagkukulang ng pagsalangsang: nguni't siyang nagpipigil ng kaniyang mga labi ay gumagawang may kapantasan.
word.maori: ¶ E kore nga kupu maha e hapa i te kino; he mahara nui ia te tangata he ngutu kokopi nei ona.
word.cebuano: Diha sa daghang mga pulong dili mawad-an sa kalapasan; Apan kadtong nagapugong sa iyang mga ngabil nagabuhat sa manggialamon gayud.
word.hebrew: יט  ברב דברים לא יחדל-פשע    וחושך שפתיו משכיל
word.hebrewmodern: ברב דברים לא יחדל פשע וחשך שפתיו משכיל׃
word.greekot: ἐκ πολυλογίας οὐκ ἐκφεύξῃ ἁμαρτίαν φειδόμενος δὲ χειλέων νοήμων ἔσῃ

word.kjv: He that troubleth his own house shall inherit the wind: and the fool shall be servant to the wise of heart.
word.thailand: บุคคลผู้ทำให้ครัวเรือนของเขาลำบากจะรับลมเป็นมรดก และคนโง่จะเป็นคนใช้ของคนที่มีใจฉลาด
word.spanish1909: El que turba su casa heredará viento; Y el necio será siervo del sabio de corazón.
word.latinvulgate: Qui conturbat domum suam possidebit ventos, et qui stultus est serviet sapienti.
word.italian1927: Chi getta lo scompiglio in casa sua erediterà vento, e lo stolto sarà lo schiavo di chi ha il cuor savio.
word.german1912: Wer sein eigen Haus betrübt, der wird Wind zum Erbteil haben; und ein Narr muß ein Knecht des Weisen sein.
word.french1910: Celui qui trouble sa maison héritera du vent, Et l'insensé sera l'esclave de l'homme sage.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 禍害自己家庭的，必承受清風；愚妄人必作心思智慧的人的僕人。
word.korean: 의인의 열매는 생명나무라 지혜로운 자는 사람을 얻느니라
word.tagalog: Siyang bumabagabag ng kaniyang sariling sangbahayan ay magmamana ng hangin: at ang mangmang ay magiging alipin ng pantas sa puso.
word.maori: ¶ Ko te tangata e whakararu ana i tona whare, he hau te taonga e whakarerea iho mona: hei pononga ano te kuware ma te ngakau whakaaro nui.
word.cebuano: Kadtong nagasamok sa iyang kaugalingong balay magapanunod sa hangin; Ug ang buang mahimong ulipon sa manggialamon ug kasingkasing.
word.hebrew: כט  עכר ביתו ינחל-רוח    ועבד אויל לחכם-לב
word.hebrewmodern: עוכר ביתו ינחל רוח ועבד אויל לחכם לב׃
word.greekot: ἐκ καρποῦ δικαιοσύνης φύεται δένδρον ζωῆς ἀφαιροῦνται δὲ ἄωροι ψυχαὶ παρανόμων

word.kjv: The fruit of the righteous is a tree of life; and he that winneth souls is wise.
word.thailand: ผลของคนชอบธรรมเป็นต้นไม้แห่งชีวิต และผู้นำวิญญาณก็มีสติปัญญา
word.spanish1909: El fruto del justo es árbol de vida: Y el que prende almas, es sabio.
word.latinvulgate: Fructus justi lignum vitæ, et qui suscipit animas sapiens est.
word.italian1927: Il frutto del giusto è un albero di vita, e il savio fa conquista d’anime.
word.german1912: Die Frucht des Gerechten ist ein Baum des Lebens, und ein Weiser gewinnt die Herzen.
word.french1910: Le fruit du juste est un arbre de vie, Et le sage s'empare des âmes.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 義人所結的果子就是生命樹；智慧人必能得人。
word.korean: 보라 의인이라도 이 세상에서 보응을 받겠거든 하물며 악인과 죄인이리요
word.tagalog: Ang bunga ng matuwid ay punong kahoy ng buhay; at siyang pantas ay humihikayat ng mga kaluluwa.
word.maori: ¶ Ko nga hua o te tangata tika he rakau no te ora; ka hopu wairua ano te tangata whakaaro tika.
word.cebuano: Ang bunga sa matarung maoy usa ka kahoy sa kinabuhi; Ug kadtong manggialamon makadani ug mga kalag.
word.hebrew: ל  פרי-צדיק עץ חיים    ולקח נפשות חכם
word.hebrewmodern: פרי צדיק עץ חיים ולקח נפשות חכם׃
word.greekot: εἰ ὁ μὲν δίκαιος μόλις σῴζεται ὁ ἀσεβὴς καὶ ἁμαρτωλὸς ποῦ φανεῖται

word.kjv: The way of a fool is right in his own eyes: but he that hearkeneth unto counsel is wise.
word.thailand: ทางของคนโง่นั้นถูกต้องในสายตาของเขาเอง แต่คนที่ยอมฟังคำแนะนำก็ฉลาด
word.spanish1909: El camino del necio es derecho en su opinión: Mas el que obedece al consejo es sabio.
word.latinvulgate: Via stulti recta in oculis ejus ; qui autem sapiens est audit consilia.
word.italian1927: La via dello stolto è diritta agli occhi suoi, ma chi ascolta i consigli è savio.
word.german1912: Dem Narren gefällt seine Weise wohl; aber wer auf Rat hört, der ist weise.
word.french1910: La voie de l'insensé est droite à ses yeux, Mais celui qui écoute les conseils est sage.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 愚妄人所行的，在自己眼中看為正直，只有智慧人肯聽勸告。
word.korean: 미련한 자는 자기 행위를 바른 줄로 여기나 지혜로운 자는 권고를 듣느니라
word.tagalog: Ang lakad ng mangmang ay matuwid sa kaniyang sariling mga mata: nguni't siyang pantas ay nakikinig sa payo.
word.maori: ¶ He tika tonu ki ona kanohi ake te ara o te kuware: e whakarongo ana ia te tangata whakaaro nui ki te kupu whakatupato.
word.cebuano: Ang dalan sa usa ka buang matarung man sa iyang kaugalingong mga mata; Apan kadtong manggialamon nagapamati ug tambag.
word.hebrew: טו  דרך אויל ישר בעיניו    ושמע לעצה חכם
word.hebrewmodern: דרך אויל ישר בעיניו ושמע לעצה חכם׃
word.greekot: ὁδοὶ ἀφρόνων ὀρθαὶ ἐνώπιον αὐτῶν εἰσακούει δὲ συμβουλίας σοφός

word.kjv: There is that speaketh like the piercings of a sword: but the tongue of the wise is health.
word.thailand: มีบางคนที่คำพูดพล่อยๆของเขาเหมือนดาบแทง แต่ลิ้นของปราชญ์นำการรักษามาให้
word.spanish1909: Hay quienes hablan como dando estocadas de espada: Mas la lengua de los sabios es medicina.
word.latinvulgate: Est qui promittit, et quasi gladio pungitur conscientiæ, lingua autem sapientium sanitas est.
word.italian1927: C’è chi, parlando inconsultamente trafigge come spada, ma la lingua de’ savi reca guarigione.
word.german1912: Wer unvorsichtig herausfährt, sticht wie ein Schwert; aber die Zunge der Weisen ist heilsam.
word.french1910: Tel, qui parle légèrement, blesse comme un glaive; Mais la langue des sages apporte la guérison.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 有人說話不慎，好像利刀刺人，智慧人的舌頭卻能醫治人。
word.korean: 혹은 칼로 찌름 같이 함부로 말하거니와 지혜로운 자의 혀는 양약 같으니라
word.tagalog: May nagsasalitang madalas na parang saliwan ng tabak: nguni't ang dila ng pantas ay kagalingan.
word.maori: ¶ He tangata ano ko ana korero maka noa, me te mea ko nga werohanga a te hoari; he rongoa ia te arero o te hunga whakaaro nui.
word.cebuano: Adunay magapamulong sa hinanali sama sa mga paglagbas sa usa ka espada; Apan ang dila sa manggialamon makaayo.
word.hebrew: יח  יש בוטה כמדקרות חרב    ולשון חכמים מרפא
word.hebrewmodern: יש בוטה כמדקרות חרב ולשון חכמים מרפא׃
word.greekot: εἰσὶν οἳ λέγοντες τιτρώσκουσιν μαχαίρᾳ γλῶσσαι δὲ σοφῶν ἰῶνται

word.kjv: A wise son heareth his father's instruction: but a scorner heareth not rebuke.
word.thailand: บุตรชายที่ฉลาดฟังคำสั่งสอนของบิดาตน แต่คนมักเยาะเย้ยไม่ฟังคำขนาบ
word.spanish1909: EL hijo sabio toma el consejo del padre: Mas el burlador no escucha las reprensiones.
word.latinvulgate: Filius sapiens doctrina patris, qui autem illusor est non audit cum arguitur.
word.italian1927: Il figliuol savio ascolta l’istruzione di suo padre, ma il beffardo non ascolta rimproveri.
word.german1912: Ein weiser Sohn läßt sich vom Vater züchtigen; aber ein Spötter gehorcht der Strafe nicht.
word.french1910: Un fils sage écoute l'instruction de son père, Mais le moqueur n'écoute pas la réprimande.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 智慧人的教訓是生命的泉源
word.korean: 지혜로운 아들은 아비의 훈계를 들으나 거만한 자는 꾸지람을 즐겨 듣지 아니하느니라
word.tagalog: Dinidinig ng pantas na anak ang turo ng kaniyang ama: nguni't hindi dinidinig ng mangduduwahagi ang saway.
word.maori: ¶ Ko te tama whakaaro nui ka rongo ki ta tona papa ako: ko te tangata whakahi ia e kore e rongo ki te riri.
word.cebuano: Ang usa ka manggialamon nga anak mamati sa pahamatngon sa iyang amahan; Apan ang usa ka mayubiton dili mamati sa pagbadlong.
word.hebrew: א  בן חכם מוסר אב    ולץ לא-שמע גערה
word.hebrewmodern: בן חכם מוסר אב ולץ לא שמע גערה׃
word.greekot: υἱὸς πανοῦργος ὑπήκοος πατρί υἱὸς δὲ ἀνήκοος ἐν ἀπωλείᾳ

word.kjv: The law of the wise is a fountain of life, to depart from the snares of death.
word.thailand: กฎเกณฑ์ของปราชญ์เป็นน้ำพุแห่งชีวิต เพื่อจะออกไปให้พ้นจากบ่วงของความมรณา
word.spanish1909: la ley del sabio es manantial de vida, Para apartarse de los lazos de la muerte.
word.latinvulgate: Lex sapientis fons vitæ, ut declinet a ruina mortis.
word.italian1927: L’insegnamento del savio è una fonte di vita per schivare le insidie della morte.
word.german1912: Die Lehre des Weisen ist eine Quelle des Lebens, zu meiden die Stricke des Todes.
word.french1910: L'enseignement du sage est une source de vie, Pour détourner des pièges de la mort.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 智慧人的訓誨是生命的泉源，能使人避開死亡的網羅。
word.korean: 선한 지혜는 은혜를 베푸나 궤사한 자의 길은 험하니라
word.tagalog: Ang kautusan ng pantas ay bukal ng buhay, upang lumayo sa mga silo ng kamatayan.
word.maori: ¶ Ko te ture o te hunga whakaaro nui, he puna no te ora, e puta ai i nga reti o te mate.
word.cebuano: Ang balaod sa manggialamon maoy usa ka tuburan sa kinabuhi, Aron nga ang usa makalikay gikan sa mga lit-ag sa kamatayon.
word.hebrew: יד  תורת חכם מקור חיים--    לסור ממקשי מות
word.hebrewmodern: תורת חכם מקור חיים לסור ממקשי מות׃
word.greekot: νόμος σοφοῦ πηγὴ ζωῆς ὁ δὲ ἄνους ὑπὸ παγίδος θανεῖται

word.kjv: He that walketh with wise men shall be wise: but a companion of fools shall be destroyed.
word.thailand: บุคคลที่เดินกับปราชญ์จะกลายเป็นคนฉลาด แต่เพื่อนฝูงของคนโง่จะถูกทำลาย
word.spanish1909: El que anda con los sabios, sabio será; Mas el que se allega á los necios, será quebrantado.
word.latinvulgate: Qui cum sapientibus graditur sapiens erit ; amicus stultorum similis efficietur.
word.italian1927: Chi va coi savi diventa savio, ma il compagno degl’insensati diventa cattivo.
word.german1912: Wer mit den Weisen umgeht, der wird weise; wer aber der Narren Geselle ist, der wird Unglück haben.
word.french1910: Celui qui fréquente les sages devient sage, Mais celui qui se plaît avec les insensés s'en trouve mal.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 與智慧人同行的，必得智慧；與愚昧人為友的，必受虧損。
word.korean: 재앙은 죄인을 따르고 선한 보응은 의인에게 이르느니라
word.tagalog: Lumalakad ka na kasama ng mga pantas na tao, at ikaw ay magiging pantas; nguni't ang kasama ng mga mangmang ay mapapariwara.
word.maori: ¶ Haere i te taha o te hunga whakaaro nui, a ka whai whakaaro koe: ko te takahoa ia o nga kuware, ka mamae.
word.cebuano: Lakat uban sa tawong manggialamon, ug ikaw mahimong manggialamon; Apan ang kauban sa mga buang magaantus tungod niana.
word.hebrew: כ  הלוך (הולך) את-חכמים וחכם (יחכם)    ורעה כסילים ירוע
word.hebrewmodern: הלוך את חכמים וחכם ורעה כסילים ירוע׃
word.greekot: ὁ συμπορευόμενος σοφοῖς σοφὸς ἔσται ὁ δὲ συμπορευόμενος ἄφροσι γνωσθήσεται

word.kjv: Every wise woman buildeth her house: but the foolish plucketh it down with her hands.
word.thailand: ผู้หญิงทั้งหลายที่มีสติปัญญาสร้างเรือนของเธอขึ้น แต่ผู้หญิงที่โง่รื้อมันลงด้วยมือตนเอง
word.spanish1909: LA mujer sabia edifica su casa: Mas la necia con sus manos la derriba.
word.latinvulgate: Sapiens mulier ædificat domum suam ; insipiens exstructam quoque manibus destruet.
word.italian1927: La donna savia edifica la sua casa, ma la stolta l’abbatte con le proprie mani.
word.german1912: Durch weise Weiber wird das Haus erbaut; eine Närrin aber zerbricht's mit ihrem Tun.
word.french1910: La femme sage bâtit sa maison, Et la femme insensée la renverse de ses propres mains.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 敬畏　神大有倚靠智慧婦人建立家室，愚妄婦人親手拆毀。
word.korean: 무릇 지혜로운 여인은 그 집을 세우되 미련한 여인은 자기 손으로 그것을 허느니라
word.tagalog: Bawa't pantas na babae ay nagtatayo ng kaniyang bahay: nguni't binubunot ng mangmang, ng kaniyang sariling mga kamay.
word.maori: ¶ Ko ta te wahine whakaaro nui he hanga i tona whare; ko ta te wahine wairangi, ko ona ringa hei wahi iho.
word.cebuano: Ang tagsatagsa ka manggialamon nga babaye magatukod sa iyang balay; Apan ang buangbuang magaguba niana uban sa iyang mga kamot.
word.hebrew: א  חכמות נשים בנתה ביתה    ואולת בידיה תהרסנו
word.hebrewmodern: חכמות נשים בנתה ביתה ואולת בידיה תהרסנו׃
word.greekot: σοφαὶ γυναῖκες ᾠκοδόμησαν οἴκους ἡ δὲ ἄφρων κατέσκαψεν ταῖς χερσὶν αὐτῆς

word.kjv: In the mouth of the foolish is a rod of pride: but the lips of the wise shall preserve them.
word.thailand: ในปากของคนโง่มีไม้เรียวแห่งความโอหัง แต่ริมฝีปากของปราชญ์จะสงวนเขาไว้
word.spanish1909: En la boca del necio está la vara de la soberbia: Mas los labios de los sabios los guardarán.
word.latinvulgate: In ore stulti virga superbiæ ; labia autem sapientium custodiunt eos.
word.italian1927: Nella bocca dello stolto germoglia la superbia, ma le labbra dei savi son la loro custodia.
word.german1912: Narren reden tyrannisch; aber die Weisen bewahren ihren Mund.
word.french1910: Dans la bouche de l'insensé est une verge pour son orgueil, Mais les lèvres des sages les gardent.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 愚妄人的口中長出驕傲的枝子；智慧人的嘴唇，能保障自己。
word.korean: 미련한 자는 교만하여 입으로 매를 자청하고 지혜로운 자는 입술로 스스로 보전하느니라
word.tagalog: Sa bibig ng mangmang ay may tungkod ng kapalaluan: nguni't ang mga labi ng pantas ay mangagiingat ng mga yaon.
word.maori: ¶ Kei te mangai o te wairangi he patu whakapehapeha; ma nga ngutu ia o te hunga whakaaro nui ratou ka ora ai.
word.cebuano: Diha sa baba sa buangbuang mao ang usa ka bunal alang sa iyang pagkamapahitas-on; Apan ang mga ngabil sa manggialamon magabantay kanila.
word.hebrew: ג  בפי-אויל חטר גאוה    ושפתי חכמים תשמורם
word.hebrewmodern: בפי אויל חטר גאוה ושפתי חכמים תשמורם׃
word.greekot: ἐκ στόματος ἀφρόνων βακτηρία ὕβρεως χείλη δὲ σοφῶν φυλάσσει αὐτούς

word.kjv: A wise man feareth, and departeth from evil: but the fool rageth, and is confident.
word.thailand: คนมีปัญญาก็เกรงกลัวและหันเสียจากความชั่วร้าย แต่คนโง่เดือดดาลด้วยความมั่นใจ
word.spanish1909: El sabio teme, y se aparta del mal: Mas el necio se arrebata, y confía.
word.latinvulgate: Sapiens timet, et declinat a malo ; stultus transilit, et confidit.
word.italian1927: Il savio teme, ed evita il male; ma lo stolto è arrogante e presuntuoso.
word.german1912: Ein Weiser fürchtet sich und meidet das Arge; ein Narr aber fährt trotzig hindurch.
word.french1910: Le sage a de la retenue et se détourne du mal, Mais l'insensé est arrogant et plein de sécurité.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 智慧人敬畏耶和華（“智慧人敬畏耶和華”或譯：“智慧人恐懼戰兢”），遠離惡事；愚昧人卻驕傲自恃。
word.korean: 지혜로운 자는 두려워하여 악을 떠나나 어리석은 자는 방자하여 스스로 믿느니라
word.tagalog: Ang pantas ay natatakot at humihiwalay sa kasamaan: nguni't ang mangmang ay nagpapakilalang palalo, at timawa.
word.maori: ¶ E wehi ana te tangata whakaaro nui, ka neke atu i te kino; ko te kuware ia ka whakahi, ka tohe.
word.cebuano: Ang usa ka tawong manggialamon mahadlok, ug magapahilayo gikan sa dautan; Apan ang buang mapangahason sa iyang kaugalingon nga may pagdaut ug siya masaligon.
word.hebrew: טז  חכם ירא וסר מרע    וכסיל מתעבר ובוטח
word.hebrewmodern: חכם ירא וסר מרע וכסיל מתעבר ובוטח׃
word.greekot: σοφὸς φοβηθεὶς ἐξέκλινεν ἀπὸ κακοῦ ὁ δὲ ἄφρων ἑαυτῷ πεποιθὼς μείγνυται ἀνόμῳ

word.kjv: The crown of the wise is their riches: but the foolishness of fools is folly.
word.thailand: มงกุฎของปราชญ์คือความมั่งคั่งของตน แต่ความโง่ของคนโง่คือความเขลา
word.spanish1909: Las riquezas de los sabios son su corona: Mas es infatuación la insensatez de los necios.
word.latinvulgate: Corona sapientium divitiæ eorum ; fatuitas stultorum imprudentia.
word.italian1927: La corona de’ savi è la loro ricchezza, ma la follia degli stolti non è che follia.
word.german1912: Den Weisen ist ihr Reichtum eine Krone; aber die Torheit der Narren bleibt Torheit.
word.french1910: La richesse est une couronne pour les sages; La folie des insensés est toujours de la folie.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 智慧人的冠冕是他們的財富；愚昧人的愚妄，始終是愚妄。
word.korean: 지혜로운 자의 재물은 그의 면류관이요 미련한 자의 소유는 다만 그 미련한 것이니라
word.tagalog: Ang putong ng mga pantas ay ang kanilang mga kayamanan: nguni't ang kamangmangan ng mga mangmang ay kamangmangan lamang.
word.maori: ¶ Hei karauna mo nga whakaaro nui o ratou taonga; ko te wairangi ia o nga kuware, he wairangi kau.
word.cebuano: Ang purongpurong sa mga manggialamon mao ang ilang mga bahandi; Apan ang binuang sa mga buang mao lamang ang kabuangan.
word.hebrew: כד  עטרת חכמים עשרם    אולת כסילים אולת
word.hebrewmodern: עטרת חכמים עשרם אולת כסילים אולת׃
word.greekot: στέφανος σοφῶν πανοῦργος ἡ δὲ διατριβὴ ἀφρόνων κακή

word.kjv: The king's favour is toward a wise servant: but his wrath is against him that causeth shame.
word.thailand: ข้าราชการที่เฉลียวฉลาดก็ได้รับความโปรดปรานจากกษัตริย์ แต่พระพิโรธของพระองค์ก็ตกลงบนผู้ที่ประพฤติน่าละอาย
word.spanish1909: La benevolencia del rey es para con el ministro entendido: Mas su enojo contra el que lo avergüenza.
word.latinvulgate: Acceptus est regi minister intelligens ; iracundiam ejus inutilis sustinebit.
word.italian1927: Il favore del re è per il servo prudente, ma la sua ira è per chi gli fa onta.
word.german1912: Ein kluger Knecht gefällt dem König wohl; aber einem schändlichen Knecht ist er feind.
word.french1910: La faveur du roi est pour le serviteur prudent, Et sa colère pour celui qui fait honte.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 明慧的臣僕，為王喜悅；貽羞的僕人，遭王震怒。
word.korean: 슬기롭게 행하는 신하는 왕의 은총을 입고 욕을 끼치는 신하는 그의 진노를 당하느니라
word.tagalog: Ang lingap ng hari ay sa lingkod na gumagawa na may kapantasan: nguni't ang kaniyang poot ay magiging laban sa nakahihiya.
word.maori: ¶ Ka manako te kingi ki te pononga mahara; a ka riri ki te tangata i takea ai te whakama.
word.cebuano: Ang kalooy sa hari anaa sa usa ka sulogoon nga nagabuhat sa pagkamaalamon; Apan ang iyang kaligutgut anaa batok niadtong nagapakaulaw.
word.hebrew: לה  רצון-מלך לעבד משכיל    ועברתו תהיה מביש
word.hebrewmodern: רצון מלך לעבד משכיל ועברתו תהיה מביש׃
word.greekot: δεκτὸς βασιλεῖ ὑπηρέτης νοήμων τῇ δὲ ἑαυτοῦ εὐστροφίᾳ ἀφαιρεῖται ἀτιμίαν

word.kjv: The tongue of the wise useth knowledge aright: but the mouth of fools poureth out foolishness.
word.thailand: ลิ้นของปราชญ์ใช้ความรู้อย่างถูกต้อง แต่ปากของคนโง่เทความโง่ออกมา
word.spanish1909: La lengua de los sabios adornará la sabiduría: Mas la boca de los necios hablará sandeces.
word.latinvulgate: Lingua sapientium ornat scientiam ; os fatuorum ebullit stultitiam.
word.italian1927: La lingua dei savi è ricca di scienza, ma la bocca degli stolti sgorga follia.
word.german1912: Der Weisen Zunge macht die Lehre lieblich; der Narren Mund speit eitel Narrheit.
word.french1910: La langue des sages rend la science aimable, Et la bouche des insensés répand la folie.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 智慧人的舌頭闡揚知識；愚昧人的口發出愚妄。
word.korean: 지혜 있는 자의 혀는 지식을 선히 베풀고 미련한 자의 입은 미련한 것을 쏟느니라
word.tagalog: Ang dila ng pantas ay nagbabadya ng tuos ng kaalaman: nguni't ang bibig ng mga mangmang ay nagbubugso ng kamangmangan.
word.maori: ¶ Ko te arero o te tangata whakaaro nui e whakahua tika ana i te matauranga: e whakapuaki ana ia te mangai o nga kuware i te wairangi.
word.cebuano: Ang dila sa manggialamon sa matul-id nagapamulong ug kahibalo; Apan ang baba sa mga buang nagabubo sa kabuangan.
word.hebrew: ב  לשון חכמים תיטיב דעת    ופי כסילים יביע אולת
word.hebrewmodern: לשון חכמים תיטיב דעת ופי כסילים יביע אולת׃
word.greekot: γλῶσσα σοφῶν καλὰ ἐπίσταται στόμα δὲ ἀφρόνων ἀναγγελεῖ κακά

word.kjv: The lips of the wise disperse knowledge: but the heart of the foolish doeth not so.
word.thailand: ริมฝีปากของปราชญ์กระจายความรู้ แต่ความคิดของคนโง่หาเป็นเช่นนั้นไม่
word.spanish1909: Los labios de los sabios esparcen sabiduría: Mas no así el corazón de los necios.
word.latinvulgate: Labia sapientium disseminabunt scientiam ; cor stultorum dissimile erit.
word.italian1927: Le labbra dei savi spargono scienza, ma non così il cuore degli stolti.
word.german1912: Der Weisen Mund streut guten Rat; aber der Narren Herz ist nicht richtig.
word.french1910: Les lèvres des sages répandent la science, Mais le coeur des insensés n'est pas droit.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 智慧人的嘴唇散播知識；愚昧人的心並不是這樣。
word.korean: 지혜로운 자의 입술은 지식을 전파하여도 미련한 자의 마음은 정함이 없느니라
word.tagalog: Ang mga labi ng pantas ay nagsasabog ng kaalaman: nguni't ang puso ng mangmang ay hindi gayon.
word.maori: ¶ E ruia ana te matauranga e nga ngutu o nga whakaaro nui: kahore ia he pena a te ngakau o nga kuware.
word.cebuano: Ang mga ngabil sa manggialamon nagabutyag ug kahibalo; Apan ang kasingkasing sa buangbuang dili magabuhat sa ingon.
word.hebrew: ז  שפתי חכמים יזרו דעת    ולב כסילים לא-כן
word.hebrewmodern: שפתי חכמים יזרו דעת ולב כסילים לא כן׃
word.greekot: χείλη σοφῶν δέδεται αἰσθήσει καρδίαι δὲ ἀφρόνων οὐκ ἀσφαλεῖς

word.kjv: A scorner loveth not one that reproveth him: neither will he go unto the wise.
word.thailand: คนมักเยาะเย้ยไม่รักคนที่ตักเตือนเขา ทั้งเขาจะไม่ไปหาปราชญ์
word.spanish1909: El escarnecedor no ama al que le reprende; Ni se allega á los sabios.
word.latinvulgate: Non amat pestilens eum qui se corripit, nec ad sapientes graditur.
word.italian1927: Il beffardo non ama che altri lo riprenda; egli non va dai savi.
word.german1912: Der Spötter liebt den nicht, der ihn straft, und geht nicht zu den Weisen.
word.french1910: Le moqueur n'aime pas qu'on le reprenne, Il ne va point vers les sages.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 好譏笑人的不喜愛責備他的人，也不到智慧人那裡去。
word.korean: 거만한 자는 견책 받기를 좋아하지 아니하며 지혜 있는 자에게로 가지도 아니하느니라
word.tagalog: Ayaw ang manglilibak na siya'y sawayin. Siya'y hindi paroroon sa pantas.
word.maori: ¶ E kore te tangata whakahi e aroha ki te kaipapaki; e kore hoki e haere ki te hunga whakaaro nui.
word.cebuano: Ang usa ka mayubiton dili mahagugma nga pagabadlongon; Siya dili moadto sa pakigtipon sa manggialamon.
word.hebrew: יב  לא יאהב-לץ הוכח לו    אל-חכמים לא ילך
word.hebrewmodern: לא יאהב לץ הוכח לו אל חכמים לא ילך׃
word.greekot: οὐκ ἀγαπήσει ἀπαίδευτος τοὺς ἐλέγχοντας αὐτόν μετὰ δὲ σοφῶν οὐχ ὁμιλήσει

word.kjv: A wise son maketh a glad father: but a foolish man despiseth his mother.
word.thailand: บุตรชายที่ฉลาดกระทำให้บิดายินดี แต่คนโง่ดูหมิ่นมารดาของตน
word.spanish1909: El hijo sabio alegra al padre: Mas el hombre necio menosprecia á su madre.
word.latinvulgate: Filius sapiens lætificat patrem, et stultus homo despicit matrem suam.
word.italian1927: Il figliuol savio rallegra il padre, ma l’uomo stolto disprezza sua madre.
word.german1912: Ein weiser Sohn erfreut den Vater, und ein törichter Mensch ist seiner Mutter Schande.
word.french1910: Un fils sage fait la joie de son père, Et un homme insensé méprise sa mère.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 智慧的兒子使父親快樂；愚昧人卻藐視自己的母親。
word.korean: 지혜로운 아들은 아비를 즐겁게 하여도 미련한 자는 어미를 업신여기느니라
word.tagalog: Ang pantas na anak ay nagpapasaya ng ama: nguni't hinahamak ng mangmang ang kaniyang ina.
word.maori: ¶ He tama whakaaro nui, ka koa te papa: tena ko te tama kuware, he whakahawea ki tona whaea.
word.cebuano: Ang usa ka anak nga manggialamon maoy kalipay sa iyang amahan; Apan ang usa ka tawong buangbuang nagatamay sa iyang inahan.
word.hebrew: כ  בן חכם ישמח-אב    וכסיל אדם בוזה אמו
word.hebrewmodern: בן חכם ישמח אב וכסיל אדם בוזה אמו׃
word.greekot: υἱὸς σοφὸς εὐφραίνει πατέρα υἱὸς δὲ ἄφρων μυκτηρίζει μητέρα αὐτοῦ

word.kjv: The way of life is above to the wise, that he may depart from hell beneath.
word.thailand: ทางแห่งชีวิตนำคนฉลาดขึ้นไปสู่เบื้องบน เพื่อเขาจะได้หลีกหนีจากนรกเบื้องล่าง
word.spanish1909: El camino de la vida es hacia arriba al entendido, Para apartarse del infierno abajo.
word.latinvulgate: Semita vitæ super eruditum, ut declinet de inferno novissimo.
word.italian1927: Per l’uomo sagace la via della vita mena in alto e gli fa evitare il soggiorno de’ morti, in basso.
word.german1912: Der Weg des Lebens geht überwärts für den Klugen, auf daß er meide die Hölle unterwärts.
word.french1910: Pour le sage, le sentier de la vie mène en haut, Afin qu'il se détourne du séjour des morts qui est en bas.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 生命之路領明慧人向上，因此他可以離開在下面的陰間。
word.korean: 지혜로운 자는 위로 향한 생명길로 말미암음으로 그 아래 있는 음부를 떠나게 되느니라
word.tagalog: Sa pantas ay paitaas ang daan ng buhay, upang kaniyang mahiwalayan ang Sheol sa ibaba.
word.maori: ¶ Ki te tangata whakaaro nui e ahu whakarunga ana te ara ki te ora, he mea kia mahue ai i a ia te reinga o raro.
word.cebuano: Alang manggialamon ang dalan sa kinabuhi nagapadulong ngadto sa itaas, Aron siya mobiya gikan sa Sheol sa ubos.
word.hebrew: כד  ארח חיים למעלה למשכיל--    למען סור משאול מטה
word.hebrewmodern: ארח חיים למעלה למשכיל למען סור משאול מטה׃
word.greekot: ὁδοὶ ζωῆς διανοήματα συνετοῦ ἵνα ἐκκλίνας ἐκ τοῦ ᾅδου σωθῇ

word.kjv: The ear that heareth the reproof of life abideth among the wise.
word.thailand: หูที่ฟังคำตักเตือนที่ให้ชีวิตจะอยู่ท่ามกลางปราชญ์
word.spanish1909: La oreja que escucha la corrección de vida, Entre los sabios morará.
word.latinvulgate: Auris quæ audit increpationes vitæ in medio sapientium commorabitur.
word.italian1927: L’orecchio attento alla riprensione che mena a vita, dimorerà fra i savi.
word.german1912: Das Ohr, das da hört die Strafe des Lebens, wird unter den Weisen wohnen.
word.french1910: L'oreille attentive aux réprimandes qui mènent à la vie Fait son séjour au milieu des sages.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 聽從有關生命之責備的，必住在智慧人中間。
word.korean: 생명의 경계를 듣는 귀는 지혜로운 자 가운데 있느니라
word.tagalog: Ang taingang nakikinig sa saway ng buhay, ay tatahan sa gitna ng pantas.
word.maori: ¶ Ko te taringa e whakarongo ana ki te whakatupato e ora ai, ka noho i waenga i te hunga whakaaro nui.
word.cebuano: Ang igdulongog nga mamati sa pagbadlong sa kinabuhi Magapuyo sa taliwala sa mga manggialamon.
word.hebrew: לא  אזן--שמעת תוכחת חיים    בקרב חכמים תלין
word.hebrewmodern: אזן שמעת תוכחת חיים בקרב חכמים תלין׃
word.greekot: ὃς ἀπωθεῖται παιδείαν μισεῖ ἑαυτόν ὁ δὲ τηρῶν ἐλέγχους ἀγαπᾷ ψυχὴν αὐτοῦ

word.kjv: The wrath of a king is as messengers of death: but a wise man will pacify it.
word.thailand: พระพิโรธของกษัตริย์เป็นผู้สื่อสารของความมรณา แต่ปราชญ์จะระงับเสียได้
word.spanish1909: La ira del rey es mensajero de muerte: Mas el hombre sabio la evitará.
word.latinvulgate: Indignatio regis nuntii mortis, et vir sapiens placabit eam.
word.italian1927: Ira del re vuol dire messaggeri di morte, ma l’uomo savio la placherà.
word.german1912: Des Königs Grimm ist ein Bote des Todes; aber ein weiser Mann wird ihn versöhnen.
word.french1910: La fureur du roi est un messager de mort, Et un homme sage doit l'apaiser.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 君王的烈怒好像死亡的使者，唯有智慧人能平息君王的怒氣。
word.korean: 왕의 진노는 살륙의 사자와 같아도 지혜로운 사람은 그것을 쉬게하리라
word.tagalog: Ang poot ng hari ay gaya ng mga sugo ng kamatayan: nguni't papayapain ng pantas.
word.maori: ¶ Ko te riri o te kingi ano he karere mo te mate: engari ka whakamarietia e te tangata whakaaro nui.
word.cebuano: Ang kaligutgut sa usa ka hari maingon sa mga sinugo sa kamatayon; Apan ang tawo nga manggialamon magapalinaw niini.
word.hebrew: יד  חמת-מלך מלאכי-מות    ואיש חכם יכפרנה
word.hebrewmodern: חמת מלך מלאכי מות ואיש חכם יכפרנה׃
word.greekot: πρὸ συντριβῆς ἡγεῖται ὕβρις πρὸ δὲ πτώματος κακοφροσύνη

word.kjv: He that handleth a matter wisely shall find good: and whoso trusteth in the LORD, happy is he.
word.thailand: บุคคลผู้จัดการธุรกิจอย่างเฉลียวฉลาดจะพบของดี และคนที่วางใจในพระเยโฮวาห์จะเป็นสุข
word.spanish1909: El entendido en la palabra, hallará el bien: Y el que confía en Jehová, él es bienaventurado.
word.latinvulgate: Eruditus in verbo reperiet bona, et qui sperat in Domino beatus est.
word.italian1927: Chi presta attenzione alla Parola se ne troverà bene, e beato colui che confida nell’Eterno!
word.german1912: Wer eine Sache klüglich führt, der findet Glück; und wohl dem, der sich auf den HERRN verläßt!
word.french1910: Celui qui réfléchit sur les choses trouve le bonheur, Et celui qui se confie en l'Eternel est heureux.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 留心聽訓言的必定得益；倚靠耶和華的是有福的人。
word.korean: 삼가 말씀에 주의하는 자는 좋은 것을 얻나니 여호와를 의지하는 자가 복이 있느니라
word.tagalog: Siyang nagiingat sa salita ay makakasumpong ng mabuti: at ang nananalig sa Panginoon ay mapalad.
word.maori: ¶ Ko te tangata e tahuri ana ki te kupu, ka kite i te pai: a ko te tangata e whakawhirinaki ana ki a Ihowa, ka hari.
word.cebuano: Kadtong nagamatngon sa pulong makakaplag ug maayo; Ug bisan kinsa nga nagasalig kang Jehova, malipayon siya.
word.hebrew: כ  משכיל על-דבר ימצא-טוב    ובוטח ביהוה אשריו
word.hebrewmodern: משכיל על דבר ימצא טוב ובוטח ביהוה אשריו׃
word.greekot: κηρία μέλιτος λόγοι καλοί γλύκασμα δὲ αὐτῶν ἴασις ψυχῆς

word.kjv: The wise in heart shall be called prudent: and the sweetness of the lips increaseth learning.
word.thailand: คนใจฉลาดเรียกว่าเป็นคนมีความพินิจ และความหวานแห่งริมฝีปากเพิ่มความเรียนรู้
word.spanish1909: El sabio de corazón es llamado entendido: Y la dulzura de labios aumentará la doctrina.
word.latinvulgate: Qui sapiens est corde appellabitur prudens, et qui dulcis eloquio majora percipiet.
word.italian1927: Il savio di cuore è chiamato intelligente, e la dolcezza delle labbra aumenta il sapere.
word.german1912: Ein Verständiger wird gerühmt für einen weisen Mann, und liebliche Reden lehren wohl.
word.french1910: Celui qui est sage de coeur est appelé intelligent, Et la douceur des lèvres augmente le savoir.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 心中有智慧的必稱為聰明人；動聽的話能增加說服力。
word.korean: 마음이 지혜로운 자가 명철하다 일컬음을 받고 입이 선한 자가 남의 학식을 더하게 하느니라
word.tagalog: Ang pantas sa puso ay tatawaging mabait: at ang katamisan sa mga labi ay nagdaragdag ng katututuhan.
word.maori: ¶ Ka kiia te whakaaro nui he matau; ma te reka hoki o nga ngutu ka neke ai te mohio.
word.cebuano: Ang manggialamon sa kasingkasing pagatawgon nga buotan; Ug ang pagkatam-is sa mga ngabil nagadugang sa kahibalo.
word.hebrew: כא  לחכם-לב יקרא נבון    ומתק שפתים יסיף לקח
word.hebrewmodern: לחכם לב יקרא נבון ומתק שפתים יסיף לקח׃
word.greekot: εἰσὶν ὁδοὶ δοκοῦσαι εἶναι ὀρθαὶ ἀνδρί τὰ μέντοι τελευταῖα αὐτῶν βλέπει εἰς πυθμένα ᾅδου

word.kjv: The heart of the wise teacheth his mouth, and addeth learning to his lips.
word.thailand: ใจของปราชญ์กระทำให้ปากของเขาสุขุม และเพิ่มการเรียนรู้แก่ริมฝีปากของเขา
word.spanish1909: El corazón del sabio hace prudente su boca; Y con sus labios aumenta la doctrina.
word.latinvulgate: Cor sapientis erudiet os ejus, et labiis ejus addet gratiam.
word.italian1927: Il cuore del savio gli rende assennata la bocca, e aumenta il sapere sulle sue labbra.
word.german1912: Ein weises Herz redet klug und lehrt wohl.
word.french1910: Celui qui est sage de coeur manifeste la sagesse par sa bouche, Et l'accroissement de son savoir paraît sur ses lèvres.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 智慧人的心教導自己的口，使自己口中的話增加說服力。
word.korean: 지혜로운 자의 마음은 그 입을 슬기롭게 하고 또 그 입술에 지식을 더하느니라
word.tagalog: Ang puso ng pantas ay nagtuturo sa kaniyang bibig, at nagdaragdag ng katututuhan sa kaniyang mga labi.
word.maori: ¶ Ma te ngakau o te tangata whakaaro nui e tohutohu tona mangai, e apiti hoki he kupu mohio ki ona ngutu.
word.cebuano: Ang kasingkasing sa manggialamon nagapahamangno sa iyang baba, Ug nagadugang sa kinaadman sa iyang mga ngabil.
word.hebrew: כג  לב חכם ישכיל פיהו    ועל-שפתיו יסיף לקח
word.hebrewmodern: לב חכם ישכיל פיהו ועל שפתיו יסיף לקח׃
word.greekot: ἀνὴρ ἄφρων ὀρύσσει ἑαυτῷ κακά ἐπὶ δὲ τῶν ἑαυτοῦ χειλέων θησαυρίζει πῦρ

word.kjv: A wise servant shall have rule over a son that causeth shame, and shall have part of the inheritance among the brethren.
word.thailand: ทาสที่เฉลียวฉลาดจะปกครองบุตรชายผู้ประพฤติความละอาย และจะได้ส่วนแบ่งมรดกเท่ากับพวกพี่น้อง
word.spanish1909: El siervo prudente se enseñoreará del hijo que deshonra, Y entre los hermanos partirá la herencia.
word.latinvulgate: Servus sapiens dominabitur filiis stultis, et inter fratres hæreditatem dividet.
word.italian1927: Il servo sagace dominerà sul figlio che fa onta, e avrà parte all’eredità insieme coi fratelli.
word.german1912: Ein kluger Knecht wird herrschen über unfleißige Erben und wird unter den Brüdern das Erbe austeilen.
word.french1910: Un serviteur prudent domine sur le fils qui fait honte, Et il aura part à l'héritage au milieu des frères.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 明慧的僕人，必管轄主人貽羞的兒子；又可以在眾兒子中同分產業。
word.korean: 슬기로운 종은 주인의 부끄러움을 끼치는 아들을 다스리겠고 또 그 아들들 중에서 유업을 나눠 얻으리라
word.tagalog: Ang lingkod na gumagawang may kapantasan ay nagpupuno sa anak na nakahihiya, at siya'y makakabahagi sa mana ng magkakapatid.
word.maori: ¶ Hei rangatira te pononga mahara mo te tama i whakama ai; ka whai wahi ano ia i roto i to nga teina.
word.cebuano: Ang usa ka ulipon nga nagapaagi sa pagkamanggialamon gayud magagahum sa usa ka anak nga nagapakaulaw, Ug makaambit sa bahin sa panulondon taliwala sa mga kaigsoonan.
word.hebrew: ב  עבד-משכיל--ימשל בבן מביש    ובתוך אחים יחלק נחלה
word.hebrewmodern: עבד משכיל ימשל בבן מביש ובתוך אחים יחלק נחלה׃
word.greekot: οἰκέτης νοήμων κρατήσει δεσποτῶν ἀφρόνων ἐν δὲ ἀδελφοῖς διελεῖται μέρη

word.kjv: A reproof entereth more into a wise man than an hundred stripes into a fool.
word.thailand: คำขนาบเข้าไปในคนฉลาดลึกกว่าเฆี่ยนคนโง่สักร้อยที
word.spanish1909: Aprovecha la reprensión en el entendido, Más que si cien veces hiriese en el necio.
word.latinvulgate: Plus proficit correptio apud prudentem, quam centum plagæ apud stultum.
word.italian1927: Un rimprovero fa più impressione all’uomo intelligente, che cento percosse allo stolto.
word.german1912: Schelten bringt mehr ein an dem Verständigen denn hundert Schläge an dem Narren.
word.french1910: Une réprimande fait plus d'impression sur l'homme intelligent Que cent coups sur l'insensé.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 對聰明人說一句責備的話，勝過責打愚昧人一百下。
word.korean: 한 마디로 총명한 자를 경계하는 것이 매 백개로 미련한 자를 때리는 것보다 더욱 깊이 박이느니라
word.tagalog: Ang saway ay nanasok na taimtim sa isang naguunawa, kay sa isang daang hampas sa mangmang.
word.maori: ¶ Ko te ngotonga o te kupu riri ki roto ki te tangata matau, nui atu i to nga whiu kotahi rau ki roto ki te whakaarokore.
word.cebuano: Ang usa ka pagbadlong motidlum sa halalum gayud nganha sa usa nga may salabutan Kay sa usa ka gatus nga mga labud nganha sa usa ka buang.
word.hebrew: י  תחת גערה במבין--    מהכות כסיל מאה
word.hebrewmodern: תחת גערה במבין מהכות כסיל מאה׃
word.greekot: συντρίβει ἀπειλὴ καρδίαν φρονίμου ἄφρων δὲ μαστιγωθεὶς οὐκ αἰσθάνεται

word.kjv: Even a fool, when he holdeth his peace, is counted wise: and he that shutteth his lips is esteemed a man of understanding.
word.thailand: ถึงคนโง่หากนิ่งเสียก็นับว่าเป็นคนฉลาด คนที่หุบริมฝีปากของเขาก็นับว่าเป็นคนมีความเข้าใจ
word.spanish1909: Aun el necio cuando calla, es contado por sabio: El que cierra sus labios es entendido.
word.latinvulgate: Stultus quoque, si tacuerit, sapiens reputabitur, et si compresserit labia sua, intelligens.
word.italian1927: Anche lo stolto, quando tace, passa per savio; chi tien chiuse le labbra è uomo intelligente.
word.german1912: Ein Narr, wenn er schwiege, wurde auch für weise gerechnet, und für verständig, wenn er das Maul hielte.
word.french1910: L'insensé même, quand il se tait, passe pour sage; Celui qui ferme ses lèvres est un homme intelligent.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 愚妄人默不作聲，也算是智慧；閉口不言，也算是聰明。
word.korean: 미련한 자라도 잠잠하면 지혜로운 자로 여기우고 그 입술을 닫히면 슬기로운 자로 여기우느니라
word.tagalog: Ang mangmang man, pagka siya'y tumatahimik, ay nabibilang na pantas: pagka kaniyang tinitikom ang kaniyang mga labi, ay inaari siyang mabait.
word.maori: Ko te wairangi nei ano, ki te whakarongo puku, ka kiia he whakaaro nui: ki te kokopi ona ngutu, ka kiia ia he tupato.
word.cebuano: Bisan ang usa ka buang, kong siya magahilum, pagaisipon nga manggialamon; Kong siya magatak-om sa iyang mga ngabil, siya pagatamdon nga ingon sa buotan.
word.hebrew: כח  גם אויל מחריש חכם יחשב    אטם שפתיו נבון
word.hebrewmodern: גם אויל מחריש חכם יחשב אטם שפתיו נבון׃
word.greekot: ἀνοήτῳ ἐπερωτήσαντι σοφίαν σοφία λογισθήσεται ἐνεὸν δέ τις ἑαυτὸν ποιήσας δόξει φρόνιμος εἶναι

word.kjv: The heart of the prudent getteth knowledge; and the ear of the wise seeketh knowledge.
word.thailand: ใจของคนหยั่งรู้ย่อมหาความรู้ และหูของปราชญ์แสวงความรู้
word.spanish1909: El corazón del entendido adquiere sabiduría; Y el oído de los sabios busca la ciencia.
word.latinvulgate: Cor prudens possidebit scientiam, et auris sapientium quærit doctrinam.
word.italian1927: Il cuore dell’uomo intelligente acquista la scienza, e l’orecchio dei savi la cerca.
word.german1912: Ein verständiges Herz weiß sich vernünftig zu halten; und die Weisen hören gern, wie man vernünftig handelt.
word.french1910: Un coeur intelligent acquiert la science, Et l'oreille des sages cherche la science.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 聰明人的心獲得知識；智慧人的耳朵尋求知識。
word.korean: 명철한 자의 마음은 지식을 얻고 지혜로운 자의 귀는 지식을 구하느니라
word.tagalog: Ang puso ng mabait ay nagtatamo ng kaalaman; at ang pakinig ng pantas ay humahanap ng kaalaman.
word.maori: ¶ Ka whiwhi te ngakau o te tangata matau ki te mohio; e rapu ana hoki te taringa o nga whakaaro nui ki te mohio.
word.cebuano: Ang kasingkasing sa buotan magabaton sa kahibalo; Ug ang igdulungog sa manggialamon magapangita sa kahibalo.
word.hebrew: טו  לב נבון יקנה-דעת    ואזן חכמים תבקש-דעת
word.hebrewmodern: לב נבון יקנה דעת ואזן חכמים תבקש דעת׃
word.greekot: καρδία φρονίμου κτᾶται αἴσθησιν ὦτα δὲ σοφῶν ζητεῖ ἔννοιαν

word.kjv: Hear counsel, and receive instruction, that thou mayest be wise in thy latter end.
word.thailand: จงฟังคำแนะนำและรับคำสั่งสอนเพื่อเจ้าจะได้ปัญญาสำหรับอนาคต
word.spanish1909: Escucha el consejo, y recibe la corrección, Para que seas sabio en tu vejez.
word.latinvulgate: Audi consilium, et suscipe disciplinam, ut sis sapiens in novissimis tuis.
word.italian1927: Ascolta il consiglio e ricevi l’istruzione, affinché tu diventi savio per il resto della vita.
word.german1912: Gehorche dem Rat, und nimm Zucht an, daß du hernach weise seiest.
word.french1910: Ecoute les conseils, et reçois l'instruction, Afin que tu sois sage dans la suite de ta vie.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 你要聽勸告，受管教，好使你將來作個有智慧的人。
word.korean: 너는 권고를 들으며 훈계를 받으라 그리하면 네가 필경은 지혜롭게 되리라
word.tagalog: Makinig ka ng payo, at tumanggap ka ng turo, upang ikaw ay maging pantas sa iyong huling wakas.
word.maori: ¶ Whakarongo ki te kupu tohutohu, tahuri mai hoki ki te ako, kia whai whakaaro ai koe i tou mutunga iho.
word.cebuano: Patalinghug sa tambag, ug dawata ang pahamatngon, Aron ikaw mahimong manggialamon sa imong kaulahian.
word.hebrew: כ  שמע עצה וקבל מוסר--    למען תחכם באחריתך
word.hebrewmodern: שמע עצה וקבל מוסר למען תחכם באחריתך׃
word.greekot: καρπὸς ἀνδρὶ ἐλεημοσύνη κρείσσων δὲ πτωχὸς δίκαιος ἢ πλούσιος ψεύστης

word.kjv: Wine is a mocker, strong drink is raging: and whosoever is deceived thereby is not wise.
word.thailand: เหล้าองุ่นให้เกิดการเยาะเย้ย และสุราก็ให้เกิดเป็นพาลเกเร ผู้ใดถูกมันหลอกลวงก็ไม่เป็นคนฉลาด
word.spanish1909: EL vino es escarnecedor, la cerveza alborotadora; Y cualquiera que por ello errare, no será sabio.
word.latinvulgate: Luxuriosa res vinum, et tumultuosa ebrietas : quicumque his delectatur non erit sapiens.
word.italian1927: Il vino è schernitore, la bevanda alcoolica è turbolenta, e chiunque se ne lascia sopraffare non è savio.
word.german1912: Der Wein macht lose Leute, und starkes Getränk macht wild; wer dazu Lust hat, wird nimmer weise.
word.french1910: Le vin est moqueur, les boissons fortes sont tumultueuses; Quiconque en fait excès n'est pas sage.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 行為正直的必蒙福酒能使人狂放，烈酒能使人喧嘩；所有因醉酒而犯錯的，都沒有智慧。
word.korean: 포도주는 거만케 하는 것이요 독주는 떠들게 하는 것이라 무릇 이에 미혹되는 자에게는 지혜가 없느니라
word.tagalog: Ang alak ay manunuya, ang matapang na alak ay manggugulo; at sinomang napaliligaw sa kaniya ay hindi pantas.
word.maori: ¶ Ko ta te waina he whakahi, ko ta te wai kaha he ngangau: a, ko te hunga katoa e whakapohehetia ana e tera, kahore o ratou whakaaro nui.
word.cebuano: Ang vino maoy usa ka tigtamay, ang maisug nga ilimnon mao ang sabaan; Ug bisan kinsa nga masayup tungod niini dili manggialamon.
word.hebrew: א  לץ היין המה שכר    וכל-שגה בו לא יחכם
word.hebrewmodern: לץ היין המה שכר וכל שגה בו לא יחכם׃
word.greekot: ἀκόλαστον οἶνος καὶ ὑβριστικὸν μέθη πᾶς δὲ ὁ συμμειγνύμενος αὐτῇ οὐκ ἔσται σοφός

word.kjv: A wise king scattereth the wicked, and bringeth the wheel over them.
word.thailand: กษัตริย์ที่ฉลาดย่อมฝัดคนชั่วร้าย แล้วทรงขับกงจักรทับเขา
word.spanish1909: El rey sabio esparce los impíos. Y sobre ellos hace tornar la rueda.
word.latinvulgate: Dissipat impios rex sapiens, et incurvat super eos fornicem.
word.italian1927: Il re savio passa gli empi al vaglio, dopo aver fatto passare la ruota su loro.
word.german1912: Ein weiser König zerstreut die Gottlosen und bringt das Rad über sie.
word.french1910: Un roi sage dissipe les méchants, Et fait passer sur eux la roue.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 智慧的王簸散惡人，並用車輪碾他們。
word.korean: 지혜로운 왕은 악인을 키질하며 타작하는 바퀴로 그 위에 굴리느니라
word.tagalog: Ang pantas na hari ay nagpapapanabog ng masama. At dinadala sa kanila ang gulong na panggiik.
word.maori: ¶ Ka titaritaria e te kingi whakaaro nui te hunga kino, a ka hurihia hoki e ia te wira patu witi ki runga ki a ratou.
word.cebuano: Ang usa ka hari nga manggialamon magaalig-ig sa dautan, Ug magapaligid kanila sa ligid sa giukan .
word.hebrew: כו  מזרה רשעים מלך חכם    וישב עליהם אופן
word.hebrewmodern: מזרה רשעים מלך חכם וישב עליהם אופן׃
word.greekot: no translation for this version

word.kjv: When the scorner is punished, the simple is made wise: and when the wise is instructed, he receiveth knowledge.
word.thailand: เมื่อคนมักเยาะเย้ยถูกลงโทษ คนเขลาก็ฉลาดขึ้น เมื่อปราชญ์ได้รับการสั่งสอน เขาก็ได้ความรู้
word.spanish1909: Cuando el escarnecedor es castigado, el simple se hace sabio; Y cuando se amonestare al sabio, aprenderá ciencia.
word.latinvulgate: Mulctato pestilente, sapientior erit parvulus, et si sectetur sapientem, sumet scientiam.
word.italian1927: Quando il beffardo è punito, il semplice diventa savio; e quando s’istruisce il savio, egli acquista scienza.
word.german1912: Wenn der Spötter gestraft wird, so werden die Unvernünftigen Weise; und wenn man einen Weisen unterrichtet, so wird er vernünftig.
word.french1910: Quand on châtie le moqueur, le sot devient sage; Et quand on instruit le sage, il accueille la science.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 好譏笑人的受刑罰的時候，愚蒙人就得著智慧；智慧人受訓誨的時候，他就得著知識。
word.korean: 거만한 자가 벌을 받으면 어리석은 자는 경성하겠고 지혜로운 자가 교훈을 받으면 지식이 더 하리라
word.tagalog: Pagka ang mangduduwahagi ay pinarusahan, ang musmos ay nagiging pantas: at pagka ang pantas ay tinuturuan, siya'y tumatanggap ng kaalaman.
word.maori: ¶ Ki te whiua te tangata whakahi, ka whai whakaaro te kuware: a, ki te whakaakona te tangata whakaaro nui, ka whiwhi ia ki te matauranga.
word.cebuano: Kong ang mayubiton pagasilotan, ang walay-pagtagad mahimong manggialamon; Ug kong ang manggialamon pahamatngonon siya makadawat ug kahibalo.
word.hebrew: יא  בענש-לץ יחכם-פתי    ובהשכיל לחכם יקח-דעת
word.hebrewmodern: בענש לץ יחכם פתי ובהשכיל לחכם יקח דעת׃
word.greekot: συνίει δίκαιος καρδίας ἀσεβῶν καὶ φαυλίζει ἀσεβεῖς ἐν κακοῖς

word.kjv: The righteous man wisely considereth the house of the wicked: but God overthroweth the wicked for their wickedness.
word.thailand: คนชอบธรรมสังเกตดูเรือนของคนชั่วร้าย แต่พระเจ้าทรงคว่ำคนชั่วร้ายลงเพราะเหตุความชั่วร้ายของเขา
word.spanish1909: Considera el justo la casa del impío: Cómo los impíos son trastornados por el mal.
word.latinvulgate: Excogitat justus de domo impii, ut detrahat impios a malo.
word.italian1927: Il Giusto tien d’occhio la casa dell’empio, e precipita gli empi nelle sciagure.
word.german1912: Der Gerechte hält sich weislich gegen des Gottlosen Haus; aber die Gottlosen denken nur Schaden zu tun.
word.french1910: Le juste considère la maison du méchant; L'Eternel précipite les méchants dans le malheur.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 公義的　神留意惡人的家，使惡人在禍患中毀滅。
word.korean: 의로우신 자는 악인의 집을 감찰하시고 악인을 환난에 던지시느니라
word.tagalog: Pinagninilay ng matuwid ang bahay ng masama, kung paanong napapahamak ang masama sa kanilang pagkapariwara.
word.maori: ¶ Ka ata whakaaroa e te tangata tika te whare o te tangata kino; te peheatanga e whakataka ai te hunga kino ki te mate mo ratou.
word.cebuano: Ang tawong matarung nagatulotimbang sa balay sa dautan, Unsaon sa pagkaunlod sa dautan ngadto sa ilang kapildihan.
word.hebrew: יב  משכיל צדיק לבית רשע    מסלף רשעים לרע
word.hebrewmodern: משכיל צדיק לבית רשע מסלף רשעים לרע׃
word.greekot: ὃς φράσσει τὰ ὦτα τοῦ μὴ ἐπακοῦσαι ἀσθενοῦς καὶ αὐτὸς ἐπικαλέσεται καὶ οὐκ ἔσται ὁ εἰσακούων

word.kjv: There is treasure to be desired and oil in the dwelling of the wise; but a foolish man spendeth it up.
word.thailand: คลังทรัพย์ประเสริฐและน้ำมันมีอยู่ในที่อาศัยของคนฉลาด แต่คนโง่กินมันหมด
word.spanish1909: Tesoro codiciable y pingüe hay en la casa del sabio; Mas el hombre insensato lo disipará.
word.latinvulgate: Thesaurus desiderabilis, et oleum in habitaculo justi : et imprudens homo dissipabit illud.
word.italian1927: In casa del savio c’è dei tesori preziosi e dell’olio, ma l’uomo stolto dà fondo a tutto.
word.german1912: Im Hause des Weisen ist ein lieblicher Schatz und Öl; aber ein Narr verschlemmt es.
word.french1910: De précieux trésors et de l'huile sont dans la demeure du sage; Mais l'homme insensé les engloutit.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 智慧人的居所中，積存珍貴的財物和油；愚昧人卻把他所有的揮霍耗盡。
word.korean: 지혜있는 자의 집에는 귀한 보배와 기름이 있으나 미련한 자는 이것을 다 삼켜버리느니라
word.tagalog: May mahalagang kayamanan at langis sa tahanan ng pantas; nguni't ito'y sinasakmal ng mangmang.
word.maori: ¶ Kei te nohoanga o te tangata whakaaro nui te taonga momohanga me te hinu; heoi maumauria ake e te wairangi.
word.cebuano: Adunay bililhon nga bahandi ug lana diha sa puloy-anan sa manggialamon; Apan ang usa ka tawong buang magalamoy niana.
word.hebrew: כ  אוצר נחמד ושמן--בנוה חכם    וכסיל אדם יבלענו
word.hebrewmodern: אוצר נחמד ושמן בנוה חכם וכסיל אדם יבלענו׃
word.greekot: ὁδὸς δικαιοσύνης καὶ ἐλεημοσύνης εὑρήσει ζωὴν καὶ δόξαν

word.kjv: A wise man scaleth the city of the mighty, and casteth down the strength of the confidence thereof.
word.thailand: ปราชญ์ปีนเข้าไปในเมืองของคนที่มีกำลัง และพังทลายที่กำบังเข้มแข็งที่เขาไว้วางใจ
word.spanish1909: La ciudad de los fuertes tomó el sabio, Y derribó la fuerza en que ella confiaba.
word.latinvulgate: Civitatem fortium ascendit sapiens, et destruxit robur fiduciæ ejus.
word.italian1927: Il savio dà la scalata alla città dei forti, e abbatte il baluardo in cui essa confidava.
word.german1912: Ein Weiser gewinnt die Stadt der Starken und stürzt ihre Macht, darauf sie sich verläßt.
word.french1910: Le sage monte dans la ville des héros, Et il abat la force qui lui donnait de l'assurance.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 智慧人登上勇士的城，傾覆他倚靠的堅壘。
word.korean: 지혜로운 자는 용사의 성에 올라가서 그 성의 견고히 의뢰하는 것을 파하느니라
word.tagalog: Sinasampa ng pantas ang bayan ng makapangyarihan, at ibinabagsak ang lakas ng pagkakatiwala niyaon.
word.maori: ¶ Ka pikitia e te tangata whakaaro nui te pa o nga marohirohi, ka taka hoki i a ia te kaha i whakawhirinaki ai ratou.
word.cebuano: Ang usa ka manggialamon nga tawo makakatkat sa usa ka ciudad sa gamhanan, Ug makapukan sa kusog nga gisaligan niana.
word.hebrew: כב  עיר גברים עלה חכם    וירד עז מבטחה
word.hebrewmodern: עיר גברים עלה חכם וירד עז מבטחה׃
word.greekot: ὃς φυλάσσει τὸ στόμα αὐτοῦ καὶ τὴν γλῶσσαν διατηρεῖ ἐκ θλίψεως τὴν ψυχὴν αὐτοῦ

word.kjv: Bow down thine ear, and hear the words of the wise, and apply thine heart unto my knowledge.
word.thailand: เอียงหูของเจ้าและฟังถ้อยคำของปราชญ์ และเอาใจใส่ความรู้ของเรา
word.spanish1909: Inclina tu oído, y oye las palabras de los sabios, Y pon tu corazón á mi sabiduría:
word.latinvulgate: Inclina aurem tuam, et audi verba sapientium, appone autem cor ad doctrinam meam :
word.italian1927: Porgi l’orecchio e ascolta le parole dei Savi ed applica il cuore alla mia scienza.
word.german1912: Neige deine Ohren und höre die Worte der Weisen und nimm zu Herzen meine Lehre.
word.french1910: Prête l'oreille, et écoute les paroles des sages; Applique ton coeur à ma science.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 待人處事需仁慈謹慎你要留心聽智慧人的言語，專心領受我的知識。
word.korean: 너는 귀를 기울여 지혜있는 자의 말씀을 들으며 내 지식에 마음을 둘지어다
word.tagalog: Ikiling mo ang iyong pakinig, at iyong dinggin ang mga salita ng pantas, at ihilig mo ang iyong puso sa aking kaalaman.
word.maori: ¶ Anga mai tou taringa, whakarongo mai hoki ki nga kupu a te hunga whakaaro nui, kia tahuri mai hoki tou ngakau ki toku matauranga.
word.cebuano: Ikiling ang imong igdulungog, ug pamatia ang mga pulong sa manggialamon, Ug ibutang ang imong kasingkasing sa akong kahibalo.
word.hebrew: יז  הט אזנך--ושמע דברי חכמים    ולבך תשית לדעתי
word.hebrewmodern: הט אזנך ושמע דברי חכמים ולבך תשית לדעתי׃
word.greekot: καὶ ἐὰν ἐμβάλῃς αὐτοὺς εἰς τὴν καρδίαν σου εὐφρανοῦσίν σε ἅμα ἐπὶ σοῖς χείλεσιν

word.kjv: My son, if thine heart be wise, my heart shall rejoice, even mine.
word.thailand: บุตรชายของเราเอ๋ย ถ้าใจของเจ้าฉลาด ใจของเราเองก็จะยินดี
word.spanish1909: Hijo mío, si tu corazón fuere sabio, También á mí se me alegrará el corazón;
word.latinvulgate: Fili mi, si sapiens fuerit animus tuus, gaudebit tecum cor meum ;
word.italian1927: Figliuol mio, se il tuo cuore e savio, anche il mio cuore si rallegrerà;
word.german1912: Mein Sohn, wenn dein Herz weise ist, so freut sich auch mein Herz;
word.french1910: Mon fils, si ton coeur est sage, Mon coeur à moi sera dans la joie;
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我兒，如果你的心有智慧，我的心也就歡喜；
word.korean: 내 아들아 만일 네 마음이 지혜로우면 나 곧 내 마음이 즐겁겠고
word.tagalog: Anak ko, kung ang iyong puso ay magpakapantas, ang puso ko'y matutuwa sa makatuwid baga'y ang akin:
word.maori: E taku tama, ki te whakaaro nui tou ngakau, ka koa hoki toku ngakau, ae ra, toku nei ano:
word.cebuano: Anak ko, kong ang imong kasingkasing magmaalamon, Ang akong kasingkasing magamalipayon, bisan ang akong kasingkasing :
word.hebrew: טו  בני אם-חכם לבך--    ישמח לבי גם-אני
word.hebrewmodern: בני אם חכם לבך ישמח לבי גם אני׃
word.greekot: υἱέ ἐὰν σοφὴ γένηταί σου ἡ καρδία εὐφρανεῖς καὶ τὴν ἐμὴν καρδίαν

word.kjv: Hear thou, my son, and be wise, and guide thine heart in the way.
word.thailand: บุตรชายของเราเอ๋ย จงฟัง และจงฉลาดเถิด และนำใจของเจ้าไปในทางนั้น
word.spanish1909: Oye tú, hijo mío, y sé sabio, Y endereza tu corazón al camino.
word.latinvulgate: Audi, fili mi, et esto sapiens, et dirige in via animum tuum.
word.italian1927: Ascolta, figliuol mio, sii savio, e dirigi il cuore per la diritta via.
word.german1912: Höre, mein Sohn, und sei weise und richte dein Herz in den Weg.
word.french1910: Ecoute, mon fils, et sois sage; Dirige ton coeur dans la voie droite.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 我兒，你要聽，要有智慧，要引導你的心走在正路上。
word.korean: 내 아들아 너는 듣고 지혜를 얻어 네 마음을 정로로 인도할지니라
word.tagalog: Makinig ka, anak ko, at ikaw ay magpakapantas, at patnubayan mo ang iyong puso sa daan.
word.maori: ¶ Whakarongo ra, e taku tama, kia whai whakaaro hoki koe, a whakatikaia tou ngakau i te ara.
word.cebuano: Mamati ka, anak ko, ug magmaalamon ka , Ug mandoi ang imong kasingkasing diha sa dalan.
word.hebrew: יט  שמע-אתה בני וחכם    ואשר בדרך לבך
word.hebrewmodern: שמע אתה בני וחכם ואשר בדרך לבך׃
word.greekot: ἄκουε υἱέ καὶ σοφὸς γίνου καὶ κατεύθυνε ἐννοίας σῆς καρδίας

word.kjv: The father of the righteous shall greatly rejoice: and he that begetteth a wise child shall have joy of him.
word.thailand: บิดาของคนชอบธรรมจะเปรมปรีดิ์อย่างยิ่ง บุคคลผู้ให้กำเนิดบุตรที่ฉลาดจะยินดีเพราะเขา
word.spanish1909: Mucho se alegrará el padre del justo: Y el que engendró sabio se gozará con él.
word.latinvulgate: Exsultat gaudio pater justi ; qui sapientem genuit lætabitur in eo.
word.italian1927: Il padre del giusto esulta grandemente; chi ha generato un savio, ne avrà gioia.
word.german1912: Der Vater eines Gerechten freut sich; und wer einen Weisen gezeugt hat, ist fröhlich darüber.
word.french1910: Le père du juste est dans l'allégresse, Celui qui donne naissance à un sage aura de la joie.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 義人的父親必大有快樂；生下智慧的兒子的，必因兒子歡喜。
word.korean: 의인의 아비는 크게 즐거울 것이요 지혜로운 자식을 낳은 자는 그를 인하여 즐거울 것이니라
word.tagalog: Ang ama ng matuwid ay magagalak na lubos: at siyang nagkaanak ng pantas na anak ay magagalak sa kaniya.
word.maori: Nui atu hoki te koa o te papa o te tangata tika; a, ko te tangata e whanau he tama whakaaro nui mana, ka hari ia ki a ia.
word.cebuano: Ang amahan sa matarung malipayon sa daku uyamut; Ug kadtong manganak sa usa ka manggialamon nga bata nagamalipayon tungod kaniya.
word.hebrew: כד  גול (גיל) יגיל אבי צדיק    יולד (ויולד) חכם וישמח- (ישמח-) בו
word.hebrewmodern: גול יגול אבי צדיק יולד חכם וישמח בו׃
word.greekot: εὐφραινέσθω ὁ πατὴρ καὶ ἡ μήτηρ ἐπὶ σοί καὶ χαιρέτω ἡ τεκοῦσά σε

word.kjv: A wise man is strong; yea, a man of knowledge increaseth strength.
word.thailand: คนฉลาดมีกำลังมาก และคนมีความรู้ก็เพิ่มกำลังขึ้น
word.spanish1909: El hombre sabio es fuerte; Y de pujante vigor el hombre docto.
word.latinvulgate: Vir sapiens fortis est, et vir doctus robustus et validus ;
word.italian1927: L’uomo savio è pien di forza, e chi ha conoscimento accresce la sua potenza;
word.german1912: Ein weiser Mann ist stark, und ein vernünftiger Mann ist mächtig von Kräften.
word.french1910: Un homme sage est plein de force, Et celui qui a de la science affermit sa vigueur;
word.chinesencvtraditional: 智慧人大有能力，有知識的人力上加力。
word.korean: 지혜 있는 자는 강하고 지식 있는 자는 힘을 더하나니
word.tagalog: Ang pantas na tao ay malakas; Oo, ang taong maalam ay lumalago ang kapangyarihan.
word.maori: He kaha te tangata whakaaro nui; ae, e whakanuia ana e te tangata mohio te kaha.
word.cebuano: Ang usa ka tawo nga manggialamon kusganon man; Oo, ang usa ka tawo sa kahibalo magauswag sa kagahum.
word.hebrew: ה  גבר-חכם בעוז    ואיש-דעת מאמץ-כח
word.hebrewmodern: גבר חכם בעוז ואיש דעת מאמץ כח׃
word.greekot: κρείσσων σοφὸς ἰσχυροῦ καὶ ἀνὴρ φρόνησιν ἔχων γεωργίου μεγάλου

word.kjv: For by wise counsel thou shalt make thy war: and in multitude of counsellers there is safety.
word.thailand: เพราะว่าโดยการนำที่ฉลาด เจ้าก็จะเข้าสงครามได้ และด้วยมีที่ปรึกษามากๆก็มีความปลอดภัย
word.spanish1909: Porque con ingenio harás la guerra: Y la salud está en la multitud de consejeros.
word.latinvulgate: quia cum dispositione initur bellum, et erit salus ubi multa consilia sunt.
word.italian1927: infatti, con savie direzioni potrai condur bene la guerra, e la vittoria sta nel gran numero de’ consiglieri.
word.german1912: Denn mit Rat muß man Krieg führen; und wo viele Ratgeber sind, da ist der Sieg.
word.french1910: Car tu feras la guerre avec prudence, Et le salut est dans le grand nombre des conseillers.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 你要憑著智謀去作戰；謀士眾多，就可得勝。
word.korean: 너는 모략으로 싸우라 승리는 모사가 많음에 있느니라
word.tagalog: Sapagka't sa pamamagitan ng pantas na pamamatnubay ay makikipagdigma ka: at sa karamihan ng mga tagapayo ay may kaligtasan.
word.maori: Na kia pai te ngarahu ina anga koe ki te whawhai: kei te tokomaha hoki o nga kaiwhakatakoto whakaaro te ora.
word.cebuano: Kay pinaagi sa maalamon nga pagmando ikaw magahimo sa imong gubat; Ug diha sa panon sa mga magtatambag walay kapildihan.
word.hebrew: ו  כי בתחבלות תעשה-לך מלחמה    ותשועה ברב יועץ
word.hebrewmodern: כי בתחבלות תעשה לך מלחמה ותשועה ברב יועץ׃
word.greekot: μετὰ κυβερνήσεως γίνεται πόλεμος βοήθεια δὲ μετὰ καρδίας βουλευτικῆς

word.kjv: These things also belong to the wise. It is not good to have respect of persons in judgment.
word.thailand: ข้อความเหล่านี้เป็นคำกล่าวของปราชญ์ด้วย การเห็นแก่หน้าคนใดในการตัดสินนั้นไม่ดีเลย
word.spanish1909: También estas cosas pertenecen á los sabios. Tener respeto á personas en el juicio no es bueno.
word.latinvulgate: Hæc quoque sapientibus. Cognoscere personam in judicio non est bonum.
word.italian1927: Anche queste sono massime dei Savi. Non è bene, in giudizio, aver de’ riguardi personali.
word.german1912: Dies sind auch Worte von Weisen. Die Person ansehen im Gericht ist nicht gut.
word.french1910: Voici encore ce qui vient des sages: Il n'est pas bon, dans les jugements, d'avoir égard aux personnes.
word.chinesencvtraditional: 當正直勤奮以下也是智慧人的話：審判的時候看人的情面是不對的。
word.korean: 이것도 지혜로운 자의 말씀이라 재판할 때에 낯을 보아주는 것이옳지 못하니라
word.tagalog: Ang mga ito man ay sabi rin ng pantas. Magkaroon ng pagtangi ng mga pagkatao sa kahatulan, ay hindi mabuti.
word.maori: ¶ He whakatauki ano hoki enei na te hunga whakaaro nui. Ehara i te mea pai kia whakaaro ki te kanohi tangata ina whakawa.
word.cebuano: Kini usab maoy mga sanglitanan sa manggialamon. Ang may pagkapinalabi sa mga tawo diha sa paghukom dili maayo.
word.hebrew: כג  גם-אלה לחכמים    הכר-פנים במשפט בל-טוב
word.hebrewmodern: גם אלה לחכמים הכר פנים במשפט בל טוב׃
word.greekot: ταῦτα δὲ λέγω ὑμῖν τοῖς σοφοῖς ἐπιγινώσκειν αἰδεῖσθαι πρόσωπον ἐν κρίσει οὐ καλόν

word.kjv: As an earring of gold, and an ornament of fine gold, so is a wise reprover upon an obedient ear.
word.thailand: คนตักเตือนที่ฉลาดกับหูที่เชื่อฟังก็เหมือนแหวนทองคำหรืออาภรณ์ทองคำเนื้อดี
word.spanish1909: Como zarcillo de oro y joyel de oro fino, Es el que reprende al sabio que tiene oído dócil.
